title: Turn in TTP terrorists involved in attack on Chinese nationals: Pakistan asks Afghanistan
creator: Sentinel Digital Desk
content: Pakistan has demanded the Taliban government in Afghanistan to hand over outlawed Tehreek-e-Taliban Pakistan‚Äôs (TTP) , who were involved in the attack on Chinese engineers in Shangla district of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, reported ARY News. The attack, which took place on March 26 in Bisham city in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa‚Äôs Shangla district, claimed the lives of five Chinese engineers along with one Pakistani citizen. The incident took place when the convoy was travelling between Islamabad and a hydroelectric dam construction site in Dasu in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. The District Inspector General (DIG) of Malakand said that a suicide bomber rammed an explosive-laden vehicle into a convoy of Chinese nationals, as reported by ARY News. Addressing a press conference along with officials of the National Counter-Terrorism Authority (Necta), Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi said Pakistan has taken up the issue with the Afghan interim government and urged them to take action against terrorist activities being carried out on their land. The interior minister added that the TTP orchestrated the Shangla terror attack from inside Afghanistan. ‚ÄúWe have requested the interim government in Afghanistan to arrest the leadership of banned TTP,‚Äù he said. Following the attack, Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif instructed the concerned authorities to conduct a thorough joint investigation into the Shangla suicide attack on Chinese nationals, utilising all the resources of the state. PM Sharif chaired a high-level emergency meeting in the aftermath of the attack on Chinese nationals, further appreciating the alacrity with which law enforcement agencies and locals responded to the attack, saving many lives that could have been lost. ‚ÄúTerrorism is a transnational threat that has been instrumentalized by the enemies of Pakistan to stymie Pakistan‚Äôs progress and development. The acts targeting Pakistan-China friendship are particularly aimed at creating mistrust between the two iron brothers,‚Äù he said. However, on Sunday, while briefing the journalists, Interior Minister Naqvi said that the probe agencies have prepared an investigation report, adding that they had concrete evidence that the TTP used Afghan soil to carry out the terror attack on Chinese engineers, reported Al Jazeera. (ANI)

title: Thibaut Courtois not included in Belgium‚Äôs Euro 2024 squad
description: The 32-year-old has been injured for the majority of the season with a knee problem which required surgery.
content: Real Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois has not been included in Belgium‚Äôs Euro 2024 squad. The 32-year-old has been injured for the majority of the season with a knee problem which required surgery. He has returned to play four times for the Spanish champions this season, but Red Devils boss Domenico Tedesco stated last month that he would not select the former Chelsea keeper for this summer‚Äôs tournament. EURO 2024 calling. üìù‚è≥ Watch the boss' press conference on Tuesday at 10AM on YouTube, https://t.co/p4YAhTplX1 of the RBFA APP. pic.twitter.com/XigdUu9lSH ‚Äî Belgian Red Devils (@BelRedDevils) May 27, 2024 And he has been true to his word, instead including Wolfsburg‚Äôs Koen Casteels, Luton goalkeeper Thomas Kaminski and Nottingham Forest‚Äôs Matz Sels. There is strong Premier League representation in the squad with Manchester City duo Kevin De Bruyne and Jeremy Doku, joined by Arsenal‚Äôs Leandro Trossard, Aston Villa midfielder Youri Tielemans, Leicester defender Wout Faes and Fulham utility player Timothy Castagne. Belgium, who went out at the group stage of the 2022 World Cup, begin their Euro 2024 campaign against Slovakia on June 17.

title: Escape to the Chateau‚Äôs Dick and Angel Strawbridge pay emotional tribute to fans as they return to Channel 4 after axe
creator: Alex Doyle
content: DICK and Angel Strawbridge have addressed their imminent return to Channel 4 - a year after being axed. The TV couple were sensationally dropped from the broadcaster after Angel's vicious row with a producer. 3 Dick and Angel Strawbridge have addressed their imminent return to Channel 4 - a year after being axed Credit: Channel 4 3 The TV couple were sensationally dropped from the broadcaster after Angel's vicious row with a producer Credit: Instagram / @escape_to_the_chateau 3 Now Dick and Angel back on air with their final series Dick and Angel's Secret France Credit: Instagram A leaked recording exposed the mother-of-two's behaviour towards a producer , which she branded a "f***ed up little c***". Following the explicit rant Channel 4 bosses announced they were cutting ties with the pair. But now Dick and Angel back on air with their final series Dick and Angel's Secret France . In a social media update to fans, the couple said: "We have some very exciting news & we want you to be the first to know! "We are back on Channel 4 with our brand-new travel series ‚ÄòSecret France with Dick & Angel‚Äô starting Sunday 2nd June at 8pm. "It‚Äôs been an voyage of discovery and we wanted to find places that were off the beaten path, where tourism hasn‚Äôt overshadowed the local culture. "We hope you join us on our journey ‚ù§Ô∏è "Love Dick & Angel." Most read in News TV LENNY LEGAL VICTORY Neil Lennon wins ¬£43k child support court battle with ex-lover AGENT ANALOGY Jack Butland tipped for Rangers exit and English Premier League move YES WAY JOSE Rangers 'to finalise transfer in 24 to 48 hours' BALOGUN'S BACK Rangers star Leon Balogun signs new one-year contract Delighted fans flooded the pair with well wishes, with one writing: "Fantastic you two will deffo be watching." A second wrote: "Oh wow!!! Brilliant you‚Äôve all been missed." Escape to the Chateau's Dick and Angel Strawbridge slam Channel 4 'axe' claims and reveal why show had to end "It is so wonderful to have you back on our screens again, I just cannot wait until 2nd June," said a third. While a fourth commented: "I am so pleased your back on TV can't wait." The Sun revealed how the new series was filmed before Angel's explicit was leaked and are remaining stern on their ban. Who are Dick and Angel Strawbridge? The TV couple shot to fame in 2016 when their series Escape to the Chateau launched on Channel 4. Running for nine series, it followed Dick and Angel as they renovated their 19th century French mansion. They have two children together, Arthur and Dorothy, who featured in the show It quickly became a fan-favourite show of the schedule as millions tuned in to see the couple tackle each corner of their 45-bedroom chateau. Escape to the Chateau came to a natural end in October 2022 by mutual agreement between Channel 4 and Dick and Angel. Despite the broadcaster and the pair working together on other projects, they were axed from the channel following a recording leaking appearing to capture Angel in a foul-mouthed exchange with a producer .

title: Fighting Hunger, Poverty In Kujigbi
creator: CALEB ONWE
description: To most residents of Kujigbi, a remote settlement in Kuje Area Council of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), the most pressing challenge has been how to put three square meals on their table. They are more interested in anything that could provide an escape route out of poverty and hunger. Although residents of the community...The post Fighting Hunger, Poverty In Kujigbi first appeared on New Telegraph.The post Fighting Hunger, Poverty In Kujigbi appeared first on New Telegraph.
content: To most residents of Kujigbi, a remote settlement in Kuje Area Council of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), the most pressing challenge has been how to put three square meals on their table. They are more interested in anything that could provide an escape route out of poverty and hunger. Although residents of the community can be said to living very close to the seat of power in Nigeria, hunger and poverty had been a major enemy they contend with on a daily basis. They seem to have no connection with the sophistications that go with modern life because they lack access to social development and can be said to be disconnected from the larger society in Nigeria. Apart from hunger and poverty, the community, suffers from acute deprivation of basic social amenities. The people seem to have learnt to live their lives with or without government‚Äôs intervention. While they may not be presently facing food shortage, they definitely cannot boost of a resilient food system. However, they will live to remember this year‚Äôs United Nations‚Äô World Food Day because the celebration has undoubtedly brought them the kind of message that soothes the heart. The message of the World Food Day, became more meaningful to them, when an Abuja based nonprofit organisation, Princely Kids Foundation and other partners stormed the community to propagate the ideals of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) which the celebration highlights. The event featured talks to sensitise the people about how to meet their basic food needs and meet the Sustainable Development Goals of the United Nations. Inside Abuja learnt that the Foundation deliberately chose the occasion of the World Food Day 2020 to highlight how food and agriculture are an essential part of the COVID-19 response, and how it could support the efforts towards economic recovery, especially for people who are limited by many socio-economic factors. Princess Jombo, who led the team to the community , stated that fighting hunger and poverty is an essential part of nation building. Jombo who struggled to hold back emotions on seeing the economic conditions of these rural people, called on privileged Nigerians to make more commitment towards empowering the less privileged members of the society. She said that an egalitarian society where citizens are empowered to actively participate in the governance process, cannot be achieved when basic needs of humanity like food and shelter remain an unaffordable luxury. She revealed that over the years, her Foundation with the support of some individuals and partner organisations have reached out to vulnerable communities, to bridge the ever widening gap between the poor and the rich. ‚ÄúPoverty breeds hunger and hunger breeds much more. We need to create a playing field for everyone, because we all need a chance for a better future. Let us empower each other to become much more,‚Äù she said. Jombo noted that when people have access to decent food, the mind would have been empowered to contribute meaningfully to the growth and development of their community. She explained that delivering food items to over 500 indigent residents in Kujigbi community was a part of the efforts of her Foundation and partners to support the well articulated objectives of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) According to her, the noble objectives which the proponents of SDG seek to achieve cannot be left for the government alone, but must be the collective responsibility of all stakeholders. Jombo noted that her team identified the community as one of the most vulnerable segments of the population in dire need of assistance in Abuja. Inside Abuja learnt that the Foundation in collaboration with other partners were working out measures to reach out to more vulnerable communities both within the FCT and other parts of the country. It was further learnt that there were some programmes already articulated to meet special needs of vulnerable children and women in hard-to- reach remote villages across the country. ‚ÄúToday we stand with over 150 countries and we promote global sensitization and an undertaking for those who suffer from hunger and malnutrition. This day creates a view for us to look into our future. Let us grow, nourish, and sustain because together, our actions are our future. ‚ÄúToday, we take collective measures and we say no more. We say: NO! to hunger, NO! to poverty, No, No, No. The covid-19 pandemic has been a time to reflect. The World Food Day 2020 is a call for global cooperation and solidarity. This year gives clarity and explains the uttermost need to help the most vulnerable recover from the crisis‚Äù, Jombo said. Inside Abuja gathered that one of the critical points of SDGs is to fight hunger and poverty, with reliable dietary plans for rural families. Seeing the crowd of Kujigbi residents who gathered to receive food and other assistance from the visiting team, was a resounding evidence that hunger could be a more lethal weapon to humanity than the pandemic. The confessions of some residents of the community gave credence to the fact that what the rural people need to become productive members of the society, could just be food on their table. While Lukas Japhet said that the rice gift, members of the community received from the team was an unaffordable commodity to most of them, Esther Kunegi noted that many families had gotten an unquantifiable solace..

title: Jennifer Lopez concerned over AI misuse after her image is exploited in scams
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Jamie Roberts)
description: Jennifer Lopez has admitted her face was 'stolen' for artificial intelligence scams - and she's 'scared' by the technology, although she can see the benefits
content: Jennifer Lopez has expressed her alarm after her image was used in fraudulent AI scams. The star, who is currently starring as the central character in Netflix's newest sci-fi flick Atlas - a film concerning issues of AI - voiced trepidations about technology's rapid progression, particularly considering her public persona. J-Lo, 54, remembered adverts falsely "selling skincare that I know nothing about", featuring doctored images of her face complete with aged wrinkles. For all the latest on news, politics, sports, and showbiz from the USA, go to The Mirror US . READ MORE: Reese Witherspoon's ex Ryan Phillippe shares 'hot' throwback of former couple J-Lo voiced her concerns Speaking to Variety, she said: "It's really scary. Right away we had them stealing our faces. So, yes, [AI] is really scary." However, she also acknowledged that AI carries potential benefits and encouraged a balanced perspective towards both its positive and negative aspects. She added: "I think you should be respectful of AI...We have to be open to all possibilities." Emphasising on the last note, the Hustlers star said, "These movies that are talking about AI - especially this one - do a really good job of showing both sides." As for 'Atlas', J-Lo, who portrays a data analyst employing AI to shield Earth from an evil robot played by Simu Liu, highlighted how the movie presents both sides of the AI debate. She clarified: "I think this movie does a good job of showing how AI could go incredibly wrong, and this is how it could go really right." Recently, Jennifer made her worries known regarding the abrupt emergence of AI in our daily lives, while also discussing filming some of the film's more intense sequences. Speaking to Extra, she expressed her concerns: "I am. I'm worried about that. I think it's a scary thing and we have to kind of be careful about it and really think about where it's going." She recalled her initial expectations: "I thought it would be me, by myself, do the takes, be so fast, don't have to worry about anybody else not remembering their lines... First day, you're falling through the planets. It's all going crazy." Reflecting on the intense filming process, she said: "Now, your leg's broke... It was so high-intensity every day, and without having another actor kind of to give you half the energy, it's just all you. I was exhausted. I would leave the 'Atlas' set limping." title: Rector Restates Administration‚Äôs Commitment To Driving Colleges‚Äô Progress, Excellence
creator: Kayode Olanrewaju
description: The Rector of Yaba College of Technology (YABATECH), Lagos, Dr Ibraheem Abdul, has assured stakeholders, particularly the members of the college community, of his administration‚Äôs continued dedication to driving progress and excellence of the institution. Abdul, who disclosed this during a public lecture organised as part of activities to mark his first year in office...The post Rector Restates Administration‚Äôs Commitment To Driving Colleges‚Äô Progress, Excellence first appeared on New Telegraph.The post Rector Restates Administration‚Äôs Commitment To Driving Colleges‚Äô Progress, Excellence appeared first on New Telegraph.
content: The Rector of Yaba College of Technology (YABATECH), Lagos, Dr Ibraheem Abdul, has assured stakeholders, particularly the members of the college community, of his administration‚Äôs continued dedication to driving progress and excellence of the institution. Abdul, who disclosed this during a public lecture organised as part of activities to mark his first year in office as Rector of the 77-year-old college, pledged that ‚Äúmore is still to come from his leadership that will signal a future filled with promise and innovation for the college.‚Äù While commending the innovation and development the college has witnessed under the leadership of the Rector, the Chairman, DSE Foundation, Chief Tunde Fanumokun, described him as a pride to reckon with and a technological game changer. Fanimokun, who chaired of the lecture, extolled Dr Abdul‚Äôs virtues, saying his simplicity and humility are some of his characteristics that have endeared him to the entire college community, declaring that YABATECH should be proud of a Rector that is a ‚Äúgame-changer‚Äù whose innovative ideas and leadership style have positioned the college at the forefront of tertiary education in Nigeria and beyond. In his keynote address, Pa George Majekodunmi Okufi, the first indigenous Rector of the College, also lauded Abdul for his innovative leadership style, which he said has brought about tangible improvements in the college. Therefore, Pa Okufi urged the college community to rally behind the Rectors vision of elevating the college to global standards. Also, the South-West Zonal Director of National Board for Technical Education (NBTE), Elder Ayo Aroge, commended the Rector for raising the standards of the college, adding that his commitment to Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) aligned with the Board‚Äôs mission to promote skills development across Nigeria. The guest lecturer, who is the Rector of Redeemers College of Technology and Management (RECTEM), Dr Awoh Stella Mofunanya, in her lecture on ‚ÄúLeadership and Service: The Need for Creativity, Innovation, and Excellence,‚Äù reiterated that in today‚Äôs rapidly evolving world, effective leadership and dedicated service require a blend of creativity, innovation, and excellence. She praised the Rector‚Äôs approach to incorporating these elements into his leadership style, ensuring that YABATECH remains adaptive and resilient in facing future challenges. ‚ÄúIn today‚Äôs rapidly evolving world, effective leadership and dedicated service are crucial for the sustained growth and success of any organisation or community. The traditional models of leadership and service are no longer sufficient, hence the need for creativity, innovation, and excellence,‚Äù she stressed.

title: Rejection of Delay Condonation Applications in cryptic, Confused and absurd manner: Orissa HC remits Income Tax Matter back to PCIT [Read Order]
creator: Irfan
description: A Division bench of the Orissa High Court has remitted the delay condonation application of the petitioner back to the Principal Commissioner of Income Tax ( PCIT ) as the rejection of the condonation application stating that the deficiency in the return could not be complied and the Form 3CB and 3CD as prescribed for [...]
content: A Division bench of the Orissa High Court has remitted the delay condonation application of the petitioner back to the Principal Commissioner of Income Tax ( PCIT ) as the rejection of the condonation application stating that the deficiency in the return could not be complied and the Form 3CB and 3CD as prescribed for filing of the return was required to be uploaded by the Chartered Accountant which came to the notice of the petitioner, who was ill, was done in an arbitrary manner. For the assessment year 2021-22 when the petitioner had submitted his return and the same was rejected on the ground of delay. According to the petitioner, the return under the provisions of the statute could not be furnished because of delay made under various reasons which were beyond his control and unless the delay is condoned, the filing of return could not be made by the petitioner. B. Panda appeared for the petitioner and S.C. Mohanty, Sr. Standing Counsel appeared for the Income Tax Department. As such, the petitioner was under treatment on account of his frequent illness and finally kept under the treatment of Dr. P.G. Satpathy, a Medicine Specialist for the period commencing from 22.03.2022 to 01.04.2022 and medical certificate was issued in this connection which was produced for consideration. The petitioner‚Äôs transactions for the assessment year 2021-22 was in fact coming under the limit of statutory audit as per Section 44AB of the Income Tax Act and unless the Auditor‚Äôs Report is accompanied in the IT return as prescribed, the filing of the return cannot be entertained. Since there was delay in furnishing the return, which was beyond the control of the petitioner, the same was rejected without taking into consideration the fact that the relief has been granted by the apex Court for condonation of delay. S.C. Mohanty, Senior Standing Counsel for the Income Tax Department vehemently contended that since there was delay on the part of the petitioner to furnish the return, therefore, the delay has not been condoned and the authority is well justified in passing the order impugned, which does not warrant interference of this Court at this stage. The bench noted that, ‚Äú it appears that the petitioner is a regular assessee before the opposite party-department. Even if the filing of IT Return was within his knowledge and was deriving income from sale of high speed diesel and income from firm‚Äôs business etc., he was required to file the IT Return disclosing the income at Rs.15,97,750/- and deposit of advance tax and all other dues of the department even if were paid to the credit of the IT Department and excess amount as per the statement prepared accrued the claim of refund at Rs.10,939/- and unless the return was entertained and delay is condoned considering the illness etc., it could not be possible to file IT Return in the relevant year. It was further noted that, ‚Äúwhen the petitioner submitted the IT return, the delay could have been condoned invoking Section 119 (2)(b) of the IT Act.‚Äù On the whole the deficiency in the return could not be complied and the and 3CD as prescribed for filing of the return was required to be uploaded by the Chartered Accountant which came to the notice of the petitioner for the uploading on 31.03.2022. Therefore, the illness of the petitioner as well as uploading of statutory made on 31.03.2022 by the concerned Chartered Accountant made the delay which was beyond the control of the petitioner, the bench noted. The division bench thus observed that, ‚ÄúAs such, the condonation delay application filed by the petitioner should not have been rejected straightway in a cryptic, confused and absurd manner without considering the orders passed by the apex Court as well as by this Court as mentioned above.‚Äù It was thus held that the order so passed by the Principal CIT, the opposite party no.2 dated 01.08.2023 under Annexure-1 cannot be sustained in the eye of law and the same is liable to be quashed and is hereby quashed. The Orissa High Court Bench of Justice and Justice G Satapathy remitted the matter back to the file of PCIT for fresh consideration, in view of the above. ¬© 2024 Taxscan ¬© 2024 Taxscan

title: Madhya Pradesh: Comedian Nalin Yadav claims harassment by ‚Äòruling party‚Äô affiliates
creator: PTI
description: BJP denies charges, terms it as a tactic of the 28-year-old comedian to gain cheap popularity
content: Home | India | Madhya Pradesh Comedian Nalin Yadav Claims Harassment By Ruling Party Affiliates Madhya Pradesh: Comedian Nalin Yadav claims harassment by ‚Äòruling party‚Äô affiliates BJP denies charges, terms it as a tactic of the 28-year-old comedian to gain cheap popularity By PTI Published Date - 28 May 2024, 02:43 PM Nalin Yadav's allegations have come after a notice issued against him by the administration in connection with a case lodged two months back over a dispute with a person at Pithampur Indore: Comedian Nalin Yadav from Madhya Pradesh has accused ‚Äúsome known affiliates of the ruling party‚Äù of harassing him and his younger brother for the past three years. However, the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has denied the charge and termed it as a tactic of the 28-year-old comedian to gain cheap popularity. Yadav‚Äôs allegations have come after a notice issued against him by the administration in connection with a case lodged two months back over a dispute with a person at Pithampur, located 40 km from here in the district. Also Read Watch: Comedian Gaurav Kapoor‚Äôs hilarious take on eating healthy The notice has been issued against Yadav by an executive magistrate under Code Of Criminal Procedure (CrPC) section 107 (requiring to show cause why he should not be ordered to execute a bond with a surety) for maintaining peace. Yadav, a resident of Pithampur, was among four persons arrested along with comedian Munawar Faruqui on January 1, 2021 following a complaint that objectionable remarks were made by the latter about Hindu deities during a comedy show at a cafe in Indore. The Indore bench of the Madhya Pradesh High Court ordered the release of Yadav from jail on interim bail on February 26, 2021. In a post on Instagram late Sunday night, Yadav claimed, ‚ÄúIn my hometown, I have a new identity as an anti-nationalist. There are a few people who are relatives and known affiliates of the ruling party, who have been harassing my brother and me for three years now.‚Äù ‚ÄúAfter getting released from jail, I haven‚Äôt been home for more than three days in two years because some of the goons here were continuously harassing us,‚Äù he alleged. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Nalin yadav (@nalinsaaheb) When contacted, State BJP spokesperson Alok Dubey said that the comedian was carrying out a false propaganda against his party in a bid to get cheap publicity through social media. According to police officials, a person, Sawan Singh Dabar, had allegedly assaulted Yadav in Pithampur on March 24 this year over an ‚Äúold enmity‚Äù following which an FIR was registered against the former on charges of assault, abuse and issuing threats. Dabar had also lodged a complaint of assault against Yadav, they said. In view of the tension between Yadav and Dabar over the incident, the notice has been issued on an application of police, to both the parties to maintain peace. Yadav‚Äôs lawyer Ashar Warsi said legal options were being considered against the notice issued in the comedian‚Äôs name. Following a complaint by Nalin Yadav‚Äôs younger brother Akash, an FIR was registered at Sector Number-1 police station of Pithampur on November 21, 2023, against local residents Uday Raghuvanshi and Krishna Thakur on charges of assault, abuse and issuing threats ‚Äúover an old dispute‚Äù, officials said. The comedian has alleged that different people from the same group in Pithampur area were constantly harassing him and his younger brother. title: Bohol governor, 67 others suspended for 6 months
description: CEBU CITY, Philippines ‚Äì Bohol Gov. Erico Aris Aumentado has been placed under suspension for six months over the controversial resort in Chocolate Hills. Aumentado on Tuesday, May 28, announced that a total of 68 Bohol Capitol officials, including him, Vice Governor Victor Balite and members of the Provincial Board, received orders from the Ombudsman
content: CEBU CITY, Philippines ‚Äì Bohol Gov. Erico Aris Aumentado has been placed under suspension for six months over the controversial resort in Chocolate Hills. Aumentado on Tuesday, May 28, announced that a total of 68 Bohol Capitol officials, including him, Vice Governor Victor Balite and members of the Provincial Board, received orders from the Ombudsman for a preventive suspension. The decision stemmed over recent cases filed against him and the province over the construction of a controversial resort in the world famous Chocolate Hills. READ: Chocolate hills resort: Bohol governor tells DENR to take legal action ASAP ‚ÄúSakit man palandungon nga mao kini ang nahitabo atong iampo sa kahitas-an nga mahatagan og ensakto ug makatarunganon og maayong kasulbaran kini tanan,‚Äù said Aumentado. READ: House bill sets rules for Chocolate Hills in Bohol The governor‚Äôs announcement was also broadcasted on his official Facebook page. The suspension order made against Aumentado came just weeks after the state‚Äôs anti-graft investigating body meted a similar punishment against Cebu City Mayor Michael Rama. title: Dick Polman: Sam Alito bets his flag gets flushed down the memory hole
description: MAGA troll Sam Alito, having signaled his solidarity with Donald Trump‚Äôs insurrectionists by flying (or allowing to have flown) an upside-down American flag at his home, is disgracing the U.S. Supreme Court with his mere presence. That sentence barely scratches the surface. I need to elaborate. As the southern writer Flannery O‚ÄôConnor said long ago, [...]
content: MAGA troll Sam Alito, having signaled his solidarity with Donald Trump‚Äôs insurrectionists by flying (or allowing to have flown) an upside-down American flag at his home, is disgracing the U.S. Supreme Court with his mere presence. That sentence barely scratches the surface. I need to elaborate. As the southern writer Flannery O‚ÄôConnor said long ago, ‚ÄúYou tell a story because a statement would be inadequate.‚Äù The story is that Alito, having openly trumpeted his bias in flagrant violation of every judicial code of ethics, deserves to be impeached. But since that certainly won‚Äôt happen ‚Äî there aren‚Äôt enough votes in the Senate, and the chamber‚Äôs Democrats are predictably too chicken to highlight the issue ‚Äî at minimum Alito should recuse himself from the long-awaited ‚Äúimmunity‚Äù ruling that could whitewash Trump‚Äôs criminal liability in the Jan. 6 insurrection. That won‚Äôt happen, either. The current high court is a sinkhole of mendacity, and its own ethics code has more holes than a slab of Swiss cheese. For instance: ‚Äúa justice should disqualify himself or herself in a proceeding in which the Justice‚Äôs impartiality might reasonably be questioned, that is, where an unbiased and reasonable person who is aware of all relevant circumstances would doubt that the Justice could fairly discharge his or her duties.‚Äù Alito can skirt that provision with ease. He can simply decide that none of his critics are ‚Äúunbiased and reasonable.‚Äù Even though a federal recusal law says that ‚ÄúAny justice, judge, or magistrate judge of the United States shall disqualify himself in any proceeding in which his impartiality might reasonably be questioned,‚Äù Alito can simply decide for himself that his impartiality is being unreasonably questioned. So Alito is betting the story of his family‚Äôs stop-the-steal flag (and a second controversial flag flown at his Jersey Shore vacation home) will simply slide down the Orwellian memory hole, just like so many of MAGA‚Äôs fascist-adjacent perfidies. That wouldn‚Äôt happen if Senate Democrats raised hell and demanded Alito appear at a hearing to explain himself, but, as we know, Dems don‚Äôt do courage (‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think there‚Äôs much to be gained with a hearing at this point,‚Äù said Judiciary Committee chairman Dick Durbin). The result: Alito has free rein to make a mockery of the oath he took to ‚Äúfaithfully and impartially discharge‚Äù his duties under the Constitution. And we become further benumbed as this once-vibrant democracy sleepwalks toward dystopia. In just the latest example, a video on Trump‚Äôs social media account said if he‚Äôs elected, we will have the ‚Äúcreation of a unified Reich.‚Äù That video prompted this reaction from ex-Trump deputy press secretary Sarah Matthews, who said, ‚ÄúTrump‚Äôs continued use of Nazi rhetoric is un-American and despicable. Yet too many Americans are brushing off the glaring red flags about what could happen if he returns to the White House. When someone shows you who they are, believe them.‚Äù But we were talking here about Alito. He went full MAGA last month during the oral argument about Trump‚Äôs fake ‚Äúimmunity‚Äù case ‚Äî he worried that a criminal prosecution of Trump might ‚Äúlead us into a cycle that destabilizes the functioning of our country as a democracy‚Äù ‚Äî and now he‚Äôs poised to vote on the ultimate ruling. There is one foreseeable ray of hope. It‚Äôs possible that he and Clarence Thomas (the other most detestably compromised justice) will be outflanked. A narrow court majority could rule that Trump‚Äôs Jan. 6 insurrectionist conduct does not shield him from criminal prosecution and that the trial currently in limbo can indeed proceed. Such a ruling wouldn‚Äôt remove the stain of Alito‚Äôs treasonous flag-waving, but it would arguably salvage the court‚Äôs credibility ‚Äî at least until the next scandal besmirches it. Dick Polman, a veteran national political columnist based in Philadelphia and a Writer in Residence at the University of Pennsylvania, writes at DickPolman.net. title: FG Sets To Include Innoson Brand in N100bn CNG Buses Presidential Initiative
creator: Olusegun Koiki
description: ‚Äì As Company Commends Tinubu For CNG Initiative LAGOS ‚Äì The Federal Government has assured that it would avoid the non-inclusion of Innoson Vehicle Manufacturing Company Ltd (IVM) in the award of contracts for the production of buses as part of the Presidential Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) Initiative. This is as Dr. Innocent Chukwuma, the Chairman, [...]
content: ‚Äì As Company Commends Tinubu For CNG Initiative LAGOS ‚Äì The Federal Government has assured that it would avoid the non-inclusion of Innoson Vehicle Manufacturing Company Ltd (IVM) in the award of contracts for the production of buses as part of the Presidential Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) Initiative. This is as Dr. Innocent Chukwuma, the Chairman, Innoson Group, has commended President Bola Tinubu for the CNG Initiative following the removal of petrol subsidy. Mr. Ekperikpe Ekpo, the Minister of State for Petroleum Resources (Gas), gave the assurance over the weekend during a tour of the existing IVM factory complex in Nnewi, Anambra State and the multi-billion new IVM plant to be opened soon with an installed capacity to manufacture 30,000 CNG vehicles annually. The minister described the non-inclusion as a ‚Äúyesterday occurrence,‚Äù and encouraged Dr. Innocent Chukwuma, Chairman, IVM to continue to provide jobs to the teeming qualified people through his factories. Stakeholders and the public had criticised the Federal Government for not including Innoson Motors in the initial contracts when the names of the auto companies tasked with the supply of the CNG buses were made public. Innoson Motors had pioneered the manufacture of autogas vehicles, including buses of varied capacities, about two years ago, even before the coming onboard of this present administration. He said: ‚ÄúToday is a different day. I can assure you that we will make a move towards making amends from what has happened yesterday to make our person (referring to Dr. Innocent Chukwuma), proud of where he comes from, and that he is from Nigeria.‚Äù Besides, Ekpo expressed delight with Chukwuma for investing keenly in the manufacture of CNG vehicles and aligning with President Bola Tinubu‚Äôs commitment to using the CNG Initiative to dampen the effect of the removal of fuel subsidy on the masses. He said the massive production of vehicles that run on CNG by Innoson was giving a boost to the transition from petrol and diesel to gas. Ekpo also remarked that manufacturing activities at IVM were in line with the aspirations of Mr. President, stressing that the president would be delighted at the growth and expansion of the company. He reiterated that the plan of Tinubu for the use of CNG was to cut cost in the spending model of government and creating a greenhouse economy. ‚ÄúThe Chairman took me to observe the exhaust pipe and when I saw it, it was very clean and nothing came out of it, and it was in the condition that we will really appreciate. So, I am really happy to see what I am seeing at Innoson. And I give him kudos for identifying with the President as he did this morning with his comment on moving ‚Äúfrom gas to prosperity. By the special grace of God, we have a son of Nigeria who is making Nigeria proud in CNG vehicle production. When I return to Abuja, I will brief the president on what I have seen and what I have experienced. It is left for the President to take a decision on the direction to go. ‚ÄúThere is a presidential committee on CNG. I will equally collaborate and sit down with them and talk about the issue, because we are looking at how to cut costs, reduce expenses which will add value to our country, Nigeria. So CNG vehicles should be patronised from all angles and I believe the President will support such aspirations,‚Äù he added. In his reaction, Chukwuma echoed his belief that the exclusion from the contract awards for the CNG buses by the Presidential Committee should be regarded as a thing of the past and a mistake, while expecting a fairer process in the future. He expressed that may be the committee was not aware the extent IVM had gone in manufacturing CNG vehicles since 2022, but stressed that the committee was now more informed about the company‚Äôs activities. He added: ‚ÄúBut, it is not compulsory that they will use IVM to start the implementation of the CNG Initiative. They can use anybody‚Äôs brand to start. But, they will later understand the true position of things as time goes on. We are all working together to move the nation forward.‚Äù The Innoson Chairman also commended Tinubu for the CNG Initiative following the removal of petrol subsidy. He further lauded the president for directing government ministries and agencies to key in into the momentum for Nigerians to follow suit He said: ‚ÄúWe have confidence in President Tinubu because he knows how to handle any situation. He is an expert and he showed it in Lagos State as a governor. So, we still believe he will do it with Nigeria. ‚ÄúAll these things we are doing here are part of our efforts to support him, so that the government can be able to make Nigeria great. With all these things we are doing and everybody‚Äôs support, the president will surely make Nigeria great. I am building this new CNG factory now and the President is expected to commission it very soon.‚Äù One of the highlights of the minister‚Äôs tour was the demonstration of the fire-fightingchafacyetistucs of IVM fire trucks, and a segment-by-segment display of a wide range of IVM vehicles.

title: Coronation Street fans ‚Äòwork out‚Äô Sarah Barlow‚Äôs next lover as Nathan is arrested in dramatic scenes
creator: Henna Sharma
content: CORONATION Street fans are convinced that the Weatherfield newcomer will become Sarah Barlow's next love interest. The new police officer Kit Green - played by Jacob Roberts - recently arrived onto the cobbles as Bernie Winter's long lost son. 6 Coronation Street has hinted at a new love interest for Sarah Platt Credit: ITV 6 Sarah decided to plant Lauren Bolton's hair bobble in Nathan Curtis' van Credit: ITV 6 But new police officer Kit caught her and asked her to let the police do their job Credit: ITV Kit has already been enthralled into the action as the detective is working with the policer to work out who killed the missing Lauren Bolton. Monday night's episode saw Sarah desperately try to help her daughter Bethany and get rid of her abuser Nathan Curtis for good. Sarah made a bold move to try and get rid of him by framing him for Lauren's murder. Having confronted Nathan beside his van, Sarah decided to return with a plastic bag containing Lauren‚Äôs hair bobble, found in her things that she left at the Platts - but Kit caught her in the act. She was forced to admit that she was planning to plant the hair bobble in Nathan‚Äôs van to prove he murdered Lauren. Kit urged her to let the police do their job, before searching the van and finding some USB sticks. After the dramatic scenes, residents and viewers learned that Nathan was arrested at the end of the episode. Is Bethany's nightmare finally over? Corrie viewers are all saying the same thing about Sarah and her potenital new love interest. Most read in Soaps 'FEELS LIKE HOME' Sima opens up on Rangers future after loan move from Brighton ends LENNY LEGAL VICTORY Neil Lennon wins ¬£43k child support court battle with ex-lover AGENT ANALOGY Jack Butland tipped for Rangers exit and English Premier League move YES WAY JOSE Rangers 'to finalise transfer in 24 to 48 hours' Taking to X - formally known as Twitter - one said: "How long till Sarah starts making her bedroom eyes at Bernie‚Äôs son." Another added: ‚ÄúI loved Adam/Sarah together but... I like Kit & Sarah together... #corrie.‚Äù Coronation Street fans call out 'massive plot hole' as evil Nathan Curtis is released from prison A third penned: ‚ÄúSarah will end up bedding Kit... I can sense it #Corrie‚Äù A fourth wrote: ‚ÄúThis is the start of Sarah and the copper getting it on. Keep on watching." Sarah split from husband Adam Barlow last year after having an affair with bad boy Damon Hay. Sarah and Damon decided to give things a go earlier this year but their romance came to a sudden end when he was arrested and imprisoned. In recent weeks, Sarah has been spending time with her ex, Gary Windass, which has lead to trouble for him in his marriage to Maria Connor. Is there something brewing between Sarah and the handsome copper? Coronation Street airs on ITV1 and is available on ITVX. 6 Sarah and Adam split after Sarah cheated on him with Damon Credit: Rex 6 Sarah fell pregnant with Damon's baby before she had a miscarriage Credit: ITV 6 She has recently reconnected with ex Gary Windass to help get rid of Nathan Credit: ITV

title: Tyson Fury's dad criticised by his own brother for behaviour during defeat
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Martin Domin)
description: Fury's dad John has been widely condemned for his advice in the corner during his son's fight against Oleksandr Usyk
content: Tyson Fury's uncle and former trainer has criticised his corner - including dad John - for their advice during the Brit's defeat by Oleksandr Usyk. Fury lost his undisputed heavyweight world title fight against Usyk in Saudi Arabia earlier this month despite dominating the first half of the fight. Usyk almost dropped his rival in the ninth round as he turned the bout on its head. And Fury's corner, including dad John, has been criticised after footage showed them telling their man he was in front and didn't need to seek a stoppage. As it was, only one judge agreed with the other two giving Usyk the nod. This article contains affiliate links, we will receive a commission on any sales we generate from it. Learn more Watch Eddie Hearn vs Frank Warren Watch Eddie Hearn vs Frank Warren live on DAZN PPV is ¬£21.99 and includes one month of a DAZN subscription. Eddie Hearn vs Frank Warren are set to lock horns in a huge 5 vs 5 event on June 1 with each promoter pitting their best fights against the other's stable in Saudi Arabia. DAZN Get it here And Peter Fury, who trained his nephew for his first world title victory against Wladimir Klitschko in 2015, believes there were too many voices in the corner. "There should only be one man in the corner, there shouldn‚Äôt be three or four," he told October Red . "Some are too emotional in the corner and some are giving the wrong advice. "I think the only one that spoke a little bit of sense in the last dying stretch of it was Sugar Hill, who said put it on him. When you go into fights, it doesn‚Äôt matter who it is, it could be a family member, but you‚Äôve got to give precise clear information, and the thing I always say to the fighter is ‚Äòare you listening, do you understand what I‚Äôve just told you to do?‚Äô "There were too many people, but maybe Tyson wants that I don‚Äôt know, it‚Äôs been years since dealings with me. I don‚Äôt know what the situation is but clearly for me the game plan was wrong and only one should be speaking. How can you listen to all that? It‚Äôs going a bit panicky and it‚Äôs all over the place. "I‚Äôve always said I can‚Äôt be bought in boxing . If someone is talking in the corner, I‚Äôd say shut your f***ing mouth now or get out the back. It‚Äôs happened before. I‚Äôm not having anything go on in that corner. You‚Äôre the bucket man, you wash the gumshield out, you wipe his head down, do not speak. That‚Äôs their instruction, and if they speak, when they get back to the dressing room, sacked on the spot. You‚Äôve got to have a professional corner."

title: OAU Alumni Calls For Suspension Of Electricity Tariff Hike
creator: Ayobami
description: ...Say it‚Äôs burden on Nigerians The Great Ife Alumni Association, Osogbo branch has called on the Federal Government to suspend the increase in electricity tariff for customers, describing it as an additional burden on the masses. This is contained in a communique issues at the end of its meeting, a copy which was made available...The post OAU Alumni Calls For Suspension Of Electricity Tariff Hike first appeared on New Telegraph.The post OAU Alumni Calls For Suspension Of Electricity Tariff Hike appeared first on New Telegraph.
content: ... The Great Ife Alumni Association, Osogbo branch has called on the Federal Government to suspend the increase in electricity tariff for customers, describing it as an additional burden on the masses. This is contained in a communique issues at the end of its meeting, a copy which was made available to journalists in Osogbo, Osun State capital, on Tuesday. In the communique jointly drafted by Revd. ‚ÄòLowo Adebiyi- Chairman, Mr Oluwamayowa Fagbohungbe, Secretary, Barr. Wuraola Ogunkola, member and made available to journalists urged the Federal Government to revert to status quo in the interest of the people. ‚ÄúDistinguished members of Great Ife(Obafemi Awolowo University Ile-Ife) Alumni Association, Osogbo Branch at its meeting of Tuesday 7th May 2024 deliberated on the increase in electricity tariff by the Federal Government through the Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC), its accompanied hardships on the people, coupled with the hardship faced by the electricity consumers in the reconfiguration/upgrading of some selected meter cards, and resolved as follows; ‚ÄúThat the Federal Government (FG) should suspend the electricity tariff increase forthwith and revert to status quo in the interest of the people. ‚ÄúThat the government after the suspension, organize public hearings in all the Six Geopolitical Zones of the Country where the planned electricity tariff increase will be exhaustively discussed and objectively assessed. ‚ÄúThe Meeting wondered why FG is still calling the shots in the nation‚Äôs electricity companies which have undergone privatization, calling on President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to right the wrongs in this important sector. ‚ÄúMembers were bewildered that despite the fact that the then Power Holding Company of Nigeria (PHCN) supplied metres that are still upgraded to inflict untold hardship on the people, querying the rationale for the reconfiguration/upgrading to take up to 3 or 4 months, before the process is completed, while energy consumers are denied the opportunity of buying energy during that long period of time essence of such upgrade. ‚ÄúThe Meeting equally wondered why our past is usually better than our present in Nigeria, with particularly reference to the Federal Ministry of Power as the last Hon. Minister of Power whose tenure is still a reference point till today is Prof. Bartholomew Nnaji, the Chairman CEO of the Geometric Power Limited, pleading with President Tinubu to appoint a professional with requisite technical competence and capacity as the Hon. Minister of Power. ‚ÄúThat President Tinubu should declare a state of emergency in the electricity sector with a view to achieving a total overhaul and clean up so as to purge the sector of corruption‚Äù.

title: Russian spy in German military sentenced to 3.5 years
creator: Sentinel Digital Desk
content: A 54-year-old German army officer who confessed to spying for Russia has been sentenced to three and a half years in prison by a court in Dusseldorf. The man, a captain, had acknowledged betraying sensitive military information to the secret services. He also joined the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) political party around the same time he offered himself up to Russian intelligence. Prosecutors accused him of serving as an agent for a hostile, ruthlessly aggressive foreign power. German police officers arrested the man in Koblenz on August 9, and he has been held in custody since then. The incident was one of several Russian spy scandals that have rocked Germany in recent months and heightened concerns about security in the country. He faced a shorter prison sentence because the information he offered to the Russians was classified as official secrets. If he had also betrayed more sensitive state secrets, he could have faced more severe punishments, up to a life sentence. The captain had claimed that he was driven by fear of a nuclear escalation during Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine. His defence lawyer argued that he began consuming fake news, propaganda and conspiracies on the social media platforms Telegram and TikTok during a difficult stretch of professional work. (IANS)

title: Couldn‚Äôt go to the airport because I was nervous about facing people in a wheelchair: Pant
creator: Press Trust of India
description: Dashing Indian wicketkeeper-batter Rishabh Pant revealed that he was reluctant to visit the airport after his life-threatening injury as he was apprehensive about facing people while wheelchair bound.The post Couldn‚Äôt go to the airport because I was nervous about facing people in a wheelchair: Pant appeared first on Cricket Country.
content: Dashing Indian wicketkeeper-batter Rishabh Pant revealed that he was reluctant to visit the airport after his life-threatening injury as he was apprehensive about facing people while wheelchair bound. The 26-year-old had suffered multiple injuries following a near-fatal car crash on the Delhi-Dehradun highway in December, 2022. He miraculously cheated death but the injuries required a major knee surgery and an extensive rehabilitation about which Pant has already opened up. ‚ÄúThe accident was a life-changing experience for me. When I got up after it, I wasn‚Äôt even sure if I would be alive, but God was very kind to save me,‚Äù Pant said on ‚ÄúDhawan Karenge‚Äù, a talk show hosted by India cricketer Shikhar Dhawan. ‚ÄúI couldn‚Äôt go to the airport because I was nervous about facing people in a wheelchair. I couldn‚Äôt even brush my teeth for two months, and for six to seven months, I suffered unbearable pain,‚Äù Pant recalled. However, the flamboyant batter returned to action after 14 months in the recently concluded IPL, giving glimpses of his devastating best.

title: EURO 2024: Thibaut Courtois Misses Out As Belgium Announce Provisional Squad
description: Real Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois was not there in the Belgium provisional squad for Euro 2024 announced by Domenico Tedesco.
content: Real Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois was not there in the Belgium provisional squad for Euro 2024 announced by Domenico Tedesco. Updated: May 28, 2024 2:58 PM IST By Thibaut Courtois was the major missing as head coach Domenico Tedesco announced Belgium‚Äôs provisional squad for the Euro 2024 to be held in Germany on Tuesday. Thus Belgium become the fifth team after European giants Italy, Germany, England and Spain to release their provisional squad. Although the reason for leaving out Courtois is not yet known, it is believed that he has just recovered a few days back from an ACL injury and has not attained match fitness. Apart from Courtois another notable omission has been Fenerbahce‚Äôs Michi Batshuayi. Tedesco would look to start things afresh after Belgium failed to win any silverware under Roberto Martinez with the so called golden generation of players they had. The squad was quite predictable with likes of Kevin De Bruyne, Thomas Meunier, Alex Witsel, Romelu Lukaku. Manchester City star Jeremy Doku has also been named in the squad. Belgium Provisional Squad for EURO 2024 Koen Casteels ,Thomas Kaminski, Matz Sels Timothy Castagne, Maxim De Cuyper, Wout Faes, Thomas Meunier, Arthur Theate, Jan Vertonghen, Zeno Debast Kevin De Bruyne, Orel Mangala, Amadou Onana, Youri Tielemans, Arthur Vermeeren, Axel Witsel, Aster Vranckx Jeremy Doku, Leandro Trossard, Romelu Lukaku, Yannick Carrasco, Johan Bakayoko, Charles De Ketelaere, Dodi Lukebakio, LoiÃàs Openda. They would look to improve on their World Cup showing in Qatar where they exited a group consisting Croatia, Canada and Morcco. They start their EURO 2024 campaign on 17 th June against Slovakia. They have been seeded in group E with Romania, Ukraine and Slovakia. For breaking news and live news updates, like us on or follow us on and . Read more on Latest on . Topics

title: Link PAN with Aadhaar by May 31 to avoid higher TDS deduction: I-T dept
creator: Northlines
description: NEW DELHI, May 28: The income tax department on Tuesday asked taxpayers to link PAN with Aadhaar by May 31 to avoid tax deduction at a higher rate.As per income tax rules, if a Permanent Account Number (PAN) is not linked with biometric Aadhaar, TDS is required to be deducted at double the applicable rate.Last [...]The post Link PAN with Aadhaar by May 31 to avoid higher TDS deduction: I-T dept appeared first on Northlines.
content: NEW DELHI, May 28: The income tax department on Tuesday asked taxpayers to link PAN with Aadhaar by May 31 to avoid tax deduction at a higher rate. As per income tax rules, if a Permanent Account Number (PAN) is not linked with biometric Aadhaar, TDS is required to be deducted at double the applicable rate. Last month, the income tax department issued a circular stating that no action will be taken for short deduction of TDS in case the assessee links his/her PAN with Aadhaar by May 31. ‚ÄúPlease link your PAN with Aadhaar before May 31, 2024, if you haven't already, in order to avoid tax deduction at a higher rate,‚Äù the department posted on X. In a separate post, the I-T department asked reporting entities, including banks, forex dealers, to file SFT by May 31 to avoid penalties. ‚ÄúThe deadline to file SFT (Statement of Specified Financial Transactions) is May 31, 2024. Avoid penalties by filing accurately and on time,‚Äù the department said. The reporting entities which are required to file SFT returns with tax authorities include forex dealers, banks, sub-registrar, NBFC, post offices, issuer of bonds/debentures, mutual fund trustees, company paying dividend or buying back shares. These specified institutions are required to furnish the details of certain financial transactions or any reportable account registered/recorded/maintained by them during the year. Delay in filing of SFT returns may attract a penalty of up to Rs 1,000 for each day of default. Non-filing or filing inaccurate statement may also lead to levy of penalty. Through SFT, the income tax department keeps a track of high value transactions undertaken by an individual.
