title: Gut health expert's warning over 'increasingly popular' supplement
creator: bristolpostnews@localworld.co.uk (Steven Smith)
description: Sea moss has benefits, but one expert said it needed to be treated with caution
content: A gut health expert has issued a warning about a popular supplement. Sea moss has gained in popularity due to its high fibre content. However, Chris Dubberley said there were "hidden dangers" of sea moss, particularly its iodine content. Chris has urged consumers to approach it with caution due to its potential implications for gut and thyroid health. Chris said: "Sea moss supplements are gaining popularity for their supposed health benefits. Although the high fibre content in sea moss could benefit digestion for some, too much may cause gastrointestinal discomfort, such as bloating and diarrhoea. "The iodine found in sea moss also poses some concern for gut health. Although it‚Äôs necessary for thyroid function, too much iodine can upset the balance of gut bacteria, leading to gastrointestinal problems, as well as - ironically - hypothyroidism. "Sea moss also includes prebiotics, which support gut health by growing helpful bacteria. However, too much prebiotic can worsen symptoms for those with certain gut conditions, such as irritable bowel syndrome (IBS). "Taking care of your gut health needs a personalised approach. Everyone has a unique digestive system with their own dietary likes, sensitivities, and health conditions. This is important to keep in mind when thinking about trying sea moss supplements. "Before picking sea moss supplements, be careful because the iodine content can vary greatly between products. It's important that these supplements have clear labels showing how much iodine they contain so people can make informed decisions about their health."

title: When it comes to wrinkles, a key hydrating ingredient holds 1,000 times its weight in water ‚Äì plus my 2 other must-haves
creator: The Insidexpress
description: A DERMATOLOGIST has revealed the three most effective ingredients to include in skincare routines for defying the signs of aging. She said beauty products should be used consistently to achieve...
content: A DERMATOLOGIST has revealed the three most effective ingredients to include in skincare routines for defying the signs of aging. She said beauty products should be used consistently to achieve optimal results. Dermatologist Nancy Wickford shared tips for slowing the signs of aging (stock image) Credit: Getty Nancy Wickford is a skincare specialist and dermatologist at the UK-based brand HelloSKIN. Speaking to The U.S. Sun, she shared must-try tips for maintaining a youthful appearance. BEAUTY BASICS Wickford said a gentle cleanser, moisturizer, SPF, and occasional exfoliation can benefit skin health at every age. She said hydrogel eye masks target the delicate areas around the eyes, prone to dryness, fine lines, and wrinkles. She suggested HelloSKIN‚Äôs Hydrating Hydrogel Eye masks for reducing the appearance of dark circles, puffiness, and crow‚Äôs feet. The $16 masks contain hyaluronic acid and the Korean complex Botaniceutical Plus-10. ‚ÄúIn the 20s and 30s, hydrogel eye masks can be used as a preventative measure to keep the eye area supple and hydrated,‚Äù Wickford said. ‚ÄúIn the 40s and beyond, when signs of aging become more apparent, these masks can help to minimize the look of existing fine lines and wrinkles while delivering intense hydration and nourishment to the delicate eye area.‚Äù Most read in Hair & Beauty Hailey Bieber loves a $380 anti-aging serum ‚Äì I found a dupe I think is better with matching ingredients & it‚Äôs 20% off SKINCARE STAPLES Wickford said patience is necessary when treating fine lines and wrinkles as it can take weeks or months to see results. She warned against using retinoids alongside harsh scrubs as she shared three ingredients that transform aging skin. ‚ÄúRetinoids: These vitamin A derivatives help increase cell turnover and stimulate collagen production,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúStart with a low-concentration retinol serum or cream and gradually increase strength as your skin builds tolerance. ‚ÄúUse at night and follow with a moisturizer. ‚ÄúHydrating face serum: Look for serums containing hyaluronic acid, which can hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water, plumping and hydrating the skin to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, such as helloSKIN‚Äôs Hydration Serum. ‚ÄúAntioxidant serums: Vitamins C and E help neutralize free radicals that contribute to premature aging. ‚ÄúUse a potent antioxidant serum in the morning under sunscreen.‚Äù What is hyaluronic acid? Healthline describes hyaluronic acid as a glycosaminoglycan naturally found in the body‚Äôs connective tissue. It keeps water molecules on the surfaces of the skin for a hydrated appearance. Hyaluronic acid reduces the appearance of wrinkles and improves wound healing. FLAWLESS FACE Wickford said professional salon treatments such as facials should be used alongside home skincare routines rather than as a replacement. ‚ÄúProfessional facials can help combat signs of aging by deeply exfoliating, hydrating, and infusing the skin with potent anti-aging ingredients,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre concerned about wrinkles, age spots, and loss of firmness, getting a facial every 4-6 weeks can be beneficial in maintaining a more youthful, radiant complexion.‚Äù YOUTHFUL GLOW The dermatologist said several lifestyle factors can potentially reverse the signs of aging. These include regular exercise for flexibility, cardiovascular health, and improved muscle tone. Also, quitting smoking, protecting the skin from sun exposure, and maintaining a healthy weight. ‚ÄúA balanced, nutrient-rich diet high in antioxidants from fruits, vegetables, and healthy fats can combat oxidative stress and inflammation linked to aging,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúAdequate sleep, stress management through practices like meditation or yoga, and staying socially engaged can also positively impact physical and cognitive function.‚Äù Buy it now *If you click on a link in this boxout we may earn affiliate revenue Hydrating Hydrogel Eye masks, $16, HelloSKIN Hydration Serum, $27, HelloSKIN HORRIFIC HACKS Wickford said three popular anti-aging hacks on social media should be avoided as they lack scientific evidence and could be harmful. ‚ÄúWhile vitamin C is beneficial for anti-aging, using undiluted lemon juice can cause severe irritation, dryness, and sometimes chemical burns on the skin due to its low pH level,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúSome people claim that the hydrocortisone in hemorrhoid creams can reduce puffiness and wrinkles around the eyes. ‚ÄúHowever, I‚Äôd always suggest avoiding using them under your eyes these creams are not formulated for the delicate eye area and can cause severe irritation, thinning of the skin, and other side effects.‚Äù She also advised against DIY dermaplanning to remove dead skin cells and peach fuzz. ‚ÄúAttempting this at home with improper tools or technique can lead to cuts, scarring, and infection, please always leave this to a professional,‚Äù she said. Wickford said hydrogel eye masks can reduce puffiness, dark circles, and crow‚Äôs feet Credit: HelloSkin Publisher

title: China to accelerate construction of intelligent coal mines
description: China vows to further accelerate the intelligent construction of coal mines in the country to promote the high-quality development of the coal industry, according to the National Energy Administration.
content: China vows to further accelerate the intelligent construction of coal mines in the country to promote the high-quality development of the coal industry, according to the National Energy Administration. The energy bureaus of all coal-producing provinces, coal industry management departments and relevant central enterprises should step up their efforts to promote the intelligence level of coal mines to a broader scope and to provide strong support for ensuring the safe and stable supply of coal and building a new energy system, it said in a notice on Monday. Production coal mines with an annual output of 3 million metric tons or more are encouraged to comprehensively promote the intelligent transformation of major production processes, it said. The administration also encourages companies and local energy bureaus to continuously improve the autonomous operation capability of production systems, including unmanned operations in fixed locations and the application of robots in hazardous and labor-intensive positions, it said.

title: China's former Olympic champion ready to swim after ban
description: China's former Olympic champion swimmer Sun Yang has reiterated his ambition of coming back to compete as strong as ever after his doping ban of over four years finished on Tuesday.
content: China's former Olympic champion swimmer Sun Yang has reiterated his ambition of coming back to compete as strong as ever after his doping ban of over four years finished on Tuesday. Sun, a former three-time freestyle Olympic champion, technically regained his eligibility to compete in an official race again on May 28 after completing a suspension of four years and three months, issued by the Court of Arbitration for Sport, that took effect from Feb 28, 2020. Sun, who turned 32 in December, said during an exclusive interview with ThePaper.cn that he's never given up on his athletic career throughout the tough years and he's ready to come back as a competitive swimmer again. "I'd decided four years ago (when the suspension was imposed) that I would not quit. Now I just hope to be back in the pool and to step back on the starting blocks again as soon as possible," Sun said during the interview. Sun's controversial doping case dated back to September 2018 when a dispute with testers from IDTM, a FINA-hired agency, over the authorization of a random out-of-competition drugs test at his residence in Hangzhou, Zhejiang province escalated into a physical confrontation. Swimming's world governing body World Aquatics (then known as FINA) ruled in January 2019 that Sun's refusal to cooperate was reasonable based on results of an independent panel's investigation that found the IDTM testers failed to show adequate proof of identification and authorization, as claimed by Sun. Two months later, the World Anti-Doping Agency appealed the FINA ruling to CAS, resulting in an 11-hour public hearing in November 2019 in Swiss city Montreux. There, a panel of three judges determined Sun was guilty and imposed the eight-year ban in February 2020. The Swiss supreme court set aside the ban in December of that year following a successful appeal by Sun's attorney that challenged the neutrality of Franco Frattini, chairman of the original CAS panel, who was deemed to display anti-China bias in comments posted by the Italian on social media. The second hearing, as required by the Swiss court, took place in May 2021 overseen by a new panel of judges, who found that Sun "had acted recklessly" when he refused to let anti-doping officials leave his home with a sample of his blood. Sun had repeatedly protested his innocence during the protracted legal dispute. He claimed that he refused to cooperate only after finding testers were operating without adequate ID proof and were taking photos of him without his permission during what was supposed to be a confidential procedure. The Lausanne-based CAS announced in June 2021 to reduce the initial eight-year ban into four years and three months, citing rule amendments that allow flexibility to assess the "entirety of the circumstances". "At the beginning (of the suspension), I suffered a lot emotionally and mentally, feeling nothing but darkness. My parents almost tried to satisfy every one of my demands at that moment, worrying that I would suffer a mental problem," Sun confessed. "Then slowly and gradually, I managed to come out of the shadows, learned to appreciate and enjoy other things in my life, got married, went back to university to continue my academic studies. "Looking back now, I feel I've gained a lot more than what I've lost during the four years. "Now I've left it all behind, made peace with what happened in the past and am ready to give it a go again," said Sun, who won two gold medals (400m and 1,500m free) at London 2012, followed by a 200m gold at Rio 2016.

title: China Eastern Airlines receives sixth C919, as the jet marks 1st anniversary of commercial operation
description: China Eastern Airlines on Tuesday took delivery of its sixth C919 jet, as the domestically developed large passenger aircraft celebrates the 1st anniversary of commercial operations.
content: China Eastern Airlines on Tuesday took delivery of its sixth C919 jet, as the domestically developed large passenger aircraft celebrates the 1st anniversary of commercial operations. C919 jets have reportedly carried nearly 300,000 passengers during the past 12 months, accumulating over 6,000 incident-free flight hours, achieving preliminary success in commercial operations. Industry analysts said the mass production and delivery of C919s is advancing steadily, projecting Chinese aircraft manufacturers may reach the same level as international industry leaders by 2035, in terms of aircraft production capacity and technical support and maintenance. On Tuesday morning, a C919 aircraft numbered B-919G departed from Shanghai Pudong International Airport and landed at Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport shortly. The plane formally joined China Eastern Airlines' fleet, according to a press release the airliner sent to the Global Times. This is the first of a purchase order of 100 C919s that China Eastern Airlines signed with Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China (COMAC) in September 2023, the company said. Since the C919's inaugural commercial flight on May 28, 2023, its commercial operation has picked up speed. Over the past year, the aircraft began flying routes between Shanghai and Beijing, operating across the Chinese Lunar New Year travel rush and debuted at the Singapore Airshow. A chartered flight from Hong Kong to Shanghai is scheduled for Jun 1, which will mark C919's first overseas commercial flight, according to China Eastern Airlines. Analysts said large-scale operation of C919s is significant to promote China's competitiveness in the global aviation market. "Over the past year, C919's commercial operations made notable progress, carrying a large number of passengers and conducting test flights on more routes. Especially, the aircraft's debut at the Singapore Airshow underlies COMAC's resolve in exploring international markets," Wang Yanan, chief editor of Beijing-based Aerospace Knowledge magazine, told the Global Times on Tuesday. In addition to China Eastern Airlines, other major domestic carriers such as Air China and China Southern Airlines have also announced purchase of C919s from COMAC. To date, global orders of C919 have exceeded 1,000 aircraft, Xinhua News Agency reported. "Currently, C919 has sufficient orders while the C929 project has begun, which points to the sound development of the country's air transport and aircraft manufacturing sector," Qi Qi, an independent market analyst, told the Global Times on Tuesday. Qi calls for the accelerated development of aircraft industrial and supply chains domestically, especially stable supply such as engines and avionics, in a bid to boost the mass production of C919 jets. COMAC Deputy General Manager Qi Xuefeng said in November 2023 that the C929 aircraft has entered its detailed design stage. The manufacturing of large aircraft should give play to the activity of domestic and foreign suppliers, but we should strive to achieve a safe and self-controllable industrial and supply chain at the most for the mass production of every aircraft model, Qi said. It's expected that Chinese aircraft manufacturers will reach the same level as international giants such as Boeing and Aircraft as early as 2035 in terms of output, technical support and maintenance, Wang said. He said the progress made by the C919 is a vivid display of China's fruitful results in high-end manufacturing, and the continuing momentum will help the country retain its leading position in global competition. China has demonstrated its strong momentum and broad prospects in the development of new quality productive forces. China's first domestically produced large cruise ship, Adora Magic City, started commercial operations in January this year, another showcase of the country's manufacturing prowess.

title: Australian offshore energy storage project undertaken by Chinese company starts construction
description: The EPC project of Templers energy storage offshore in South Australia, contracted by China Energy Engineering Group's Shanxi Electric Power Construction Company commenced on Friday, according to the company.
content: (ECNS) -- The Engineering Procurement Construction ( EPC) project of Templers energy storage offshore in South Australia, contracted by China Energy Engineering Group's Shanxi Electric Power Construction Company commenced on Friday, according to the company. With a total construction capacity of 138 megawatts/330 megawatt hours, it is the company's first energy storage project in the Australian market. China Energy Engineering Group has gradually expanded into Australia's clean energy and storage industry and has signed a series of cooperation agreements with local developers, including ZEN Energy. Upon completion, the project will fully utilize the abundant local solar resources to stably deliver clean electricity. It holds significant importance for enhancing local grid security, improving the energy structure, reducing carbon emissions, and promoting the sustainable development of a green economy.

title: AP EAMCET 2024 rank list soon at cets.apsche.ap.gov.in/EAPCET; check response sheet here
creator: Arpita Das
description: The AP EAMCET 2024 rank card will be released on May 28. Candidates can download their AP EAMCET 2024 rank card using the registration number, hall ticket number and date of birth.
content: The AP EAMCET 2024 rank card will be released on May 28. Candidates can download their AP EAMCET 2024 rank card using the registration number, hall ticket number and date of birth. New Delhi: The Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU) Kakinada will declare the AP EAMCET 2024 result soon. Along with the result, the AP EAMCET rank list will also be made available. The AP EAPCET result link will be activated on the official website, cets.apsche.ap.gov.in/EAPCET, once it is out. To check the result and download the AP EAMCET 2024 rank list, the hall ticket and registration number will be required. Those candidates whose names will be on the rank list will have to participate in the Andhra EAPCET counselling round. AP EAMCET Rank List 2024 The exam conducting authority will release the AP EAMCET 2024 rank list along with the result. The AP EAMCET 2024 (Engineering, Agriculture & Pharmacy Common Entrance Test) will now have 100 per cent weightage on the marks secured in the exam for determining overall rankings for admissions into professional courses this year. Previously, rankings were based on a combination of AP EAMCET normalized marks (75 per cent weightage) and Class 12 marks (25 per cent weightage) in the order of merit. AP EAMCET Response Sheet 2024 The AP EAMCET 2024 response sheet for Engineering was released on May 24 along with the answer key. Candidates who appeared for the exam can download the AP EAPCET response sheet 2024 using the EAPCET hall ticket number, registration number and date of birth. title: M4 iPad Pro 13 Inch vs M2 iPad Air 13 Inch (Video)
creator: Roland Hutchinson
description: When deciding between the M4 iPad Pro 13-inch and the M2 iPad Air 13-inch, you need to carefully consider the higher cost of the M4 iPad Pro and weigh it against the enhanced features and performance it offers. While both devices provide a high-quality tablet experience, the M4 iPad Pro stands out with its cutting-edge [...]The post M4 iPad Pro 13 Inch vs M2 iPad Air 13 Inch (Video) appeared first on Geeky Gadgets.
content: When deciding between the M4 iPad Pro 13-inch and the 13-inch, you need to carefully consider the higher cost of the M4 iPad Pro and weigh it against the enhanced features and performance it offers. While both devices provide a high-quality tablet experience, the M4 iPad Pro stands out with its cutting-edge technology and superior capabilities. One of the most significant factors to consider is the between the two models. The M4 iPad Pro is priced at $1,300, while the M2 iPad Air costs $800. This substantial $500 gap may be a deciding factor for many users, especially those on a tighter budget. However, it‚Äôs essential to evaluate the additional features and performance improvements offered by the M4 iPad Pro to determine if the extra investment is justified for your specific needs and preferences. In terms of , the M4 iPad Pro has an edge over the M2 iPad Air. It is both thinner and lighter, making it more portable and comfortable to handle during extended use. This can be particularly beneficial for users who frequently travel or use their iPad for long periods. The M4 iPad Pro also boasts an , which includes LiDAR technology, an extra flash, and an ambient light sensor. These features enhance photography and experiences, providing more accurate depth perception and improved low-light performance. In contrast, the M2 iPad Air incorporates Touch ID into the power button, offering a different type of convenience for users who prioritize quick and secure access to their device. When it comes to , both models feature USB-C ports. However, the M4 iPad Pro takes it a step further by supporting Thunderbolt speeds. This allows for faster data transfer and more versatile connectivity options, such as the ability to connect to external displays and high-speed storage devices. The is another area where the M4 iPad Pro shines. It comes equipped with four active speaker grills, delivering a richer and more immersive sound compared to the two active speaker grills found on the M2 iPad Air. While the M2 iPad Air still provides good sound quality, the M4 iPad Pro offers a more premium audio experience. One of the most striking differences between the two models lies in their . The M4 iPad Pro features a tandem OLED display with a peak brightness of 1,600 nits and a smooth 120Hz refresh rate. This results in more vibrant colors, deeper blacks, and an overall more visually stunning experience. In comparison, the M2 iPad Air has an with a brightness of 600 nits and a standard 60Hz refresh rate. While the M2 iPad Air‚Äôs display is still of good quality, it may not be as impressive as the M4 iPad Pro‚Äôs cutting-edge OLED technology. The M4 iPad Pro‚Äôs tandem OLED display offers more vibrant colors and smoother visuals compared to the LCD display. The M4 iPad Pro supports Thunderbolt speeds for faster data transfer and more versatile connectivity options. In terms of , the M4 iPad Pro is powered by the advanced M4 chip, which operates at 4.4 GHz. This translates to: 43% faster single-core performance 32% faster multi-core performance 26% faster web browsing 25% higher graphics performance compared to the M2 iPad Air, which uses the M2 chip at 3.47 GHz. The M4 iPad Pro‚Äôs superior performance makes it better suited for demanding tasks such as video editing, 3D modeling, and gaming. Another advantage of the M4 iPad Pro is its improved . With better heat dissipation, the device is less likely to experience thermal throttling during intensive tasks, ensuring sustained performance over longer periods. This is particularly important for users who regularly engage in resource-intensive activities on their iPad. The M4 iPad Pro comes with a generous 256GB SSD, providing ample storage space for apps, media, and files. In contrast, the M2 iPad Air offers a 128GB SSD, which may be sufficient for lighter use but could be limiting for users with more extensive storage needs. When it comes to , the iPad Pro supports the new second-generation Magic Keyboard. This upgraded keyboard includes a function row, a more responsive trackpad, and improved keys, enhancing the overall typing and navigation experience. The M2 iPad Air, on the other hand, is compatible with the older Magic Keyboard, which lacks these enhancements. Both models feature a new landscape camera, which is beneficial for and online meetings. However, the M4 iPad Pro potentially offers better microphone quality, making it a superior choice for users who frequently engage in audio recordings or video conferences. Ultimately, the choice between the M4 iPad Pro and the M2 iPad Air depends on your specific needs, preferences, and budget. If you prioritize the highest level of performance, display quality, and additional features, and your budget allows for it, the M4 iPad Pro is the clear winner. Its advanced technology and superior capabilities make it an excellent investment for demanding users who require the best possible iPad experience. However, if you are working with a tighter budget or don‚Äôt require the most cutting-edge features, the M2 iPad Air remains a strong contender. It offers a large display, good performance, and a more affordable price point, providing excellent value for money. The M2 iPad Air is a solid choice for users who want a high-quality tablet without breaking the bank. Consider your specific use case, the apps and tasks you frequently engage in, and your long-term needs when making your decision. If you plan to use your iPad for resource-intensive activities like , 3D modeling, or gaming, the iPad Pro‚Äôs superior performance and thermal management will likely be worth the extra investment. On the other hand, if you primarily use your iPad for web browsing, media consumption, and light productivity tasks, the M2 iPad Air will likely suffice. Regardless of which model you choose, both the iPad Pro and the iPad Air offer a premium tablet experience with a large display, powerful performance, and a range of features to enhance your digital life. By carefully weighing the differences in price, features, and performance, you can make an informed decision that best suits your needs and budget. Source & Image Credit:

title: 'Husband ghosted me after boozy night with pals ‚Äì you won't believe his 5-word response'
creator: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Danielle Kate Wroe)
description: A woman whose husband went 'AWOL' during a boozy night with friends was shocked by his response when she said she was 'upset', and now fears family life might not be for him
content: A mum was left in a state of bewilderment when her husband went "AWOL" while enjoying time with his friends. With two young children at home, aged four and six months, she was understandably worried about his "zero contact" approach while out on a session that lasted from the afternoon into the early hours. Taking her concerns to Mumsnet , the woman recounted how she had "forgiven him for a lot over the years". She sought the opinions of fellow users, delving into the details of his behaviour. She wrote: "I woke up with the baby in the early hours and he wasn't home, so I sent a message asking where he was. No reply. Up with baby again about an hour and a half later, again no reply. Tried to call with the next wake up, didn't pick up. By this point it was about 5.30am - everything would have been closed. He went out in the afternoon. Read More Related Articles People are just learning that tiny balconies with no floor have 'fantastic' use "If he'd have responded 'in a bar/at friend's house, be home later' or just ANYTHING it would've been fine, but it was the ignoring that bothered me. He would've just not come home with zero contact if I hadn't pushed it. "The next time I woke with baby (we're both ill with Covid and she's exclusively breastfeeding, so I've done all night feeds for 6 months and am knackered/feeling s**t) I sent a message saying I was locking the front door. Miraculously he responded straight away. He claimed he had been trying to get home for 'hours' but his bank cards had been 'blocked'. "I told him how upset/angry I was and that he should have just messaged me, etc. etc., and he told me I was 'locking him out of his home' and that 'this is your decision, not mine' - as if I'm ending the relationship. Feels like he's trying to push me to leave." The woman told him she was "upset", calling him "irresponsible" because he's 36 - and his cruel five-word response was "cry me a f**king river". She was wondering "if his story is true", why would he have ghosted her. "Also, he could've gone home with friends who live in the same direction or asked one of them to book him an Uber and pay them back," she fumed. "Also thinking if it's true, he's blown an awful lot of money...Why else would his cards stop working other than the accounts being emptied?" Read More Related Articles Woman's 'inspirational' tattoo goes viral for all the wrong reasons She said he hadn't yet "made an appearance" and she'd had to lie to her eldest child saying he was "having a sleepover with his friend". When she spoke to her friend, they said "it comes across like he just doesn't care" about her, or "being a family man". The woman is now worried he wants the "single lifestyle over his family". She added: "I wouldn't mind as much if this was a one-off, but he's got form for irresponsible partying-type behaviour and, like I said, has pulled disappearing acts before. But then part of me thinks maybe I am just going crazy and being harsh." Online commenters were left bewildered by her situation, questioning why she remained with him. A commenter responded: "Get him out, because he's vile, and enjoy your life." Another declared: "Overreacting? Hardly. I very rarely say this but I would be thinking very carefully about this relationship. You say you've forgiven him a lot over the years. It sounds as if that has encouraged him to behave worse and worse rather than feel grateful for your forbearance. "Also, I would be very suspicious that he's not just drinking on these binges [...] In short, I'd be keeping that door locked a while and have a hard think." And another added: "I'd go f**king mental. I just wouldn't tolerate this. I'd have his bags packed and on the doorstep awaiting his arrival."

title: Cost Savings and Efficiency Gains: The Financial Benefits of Cloud-Based Construction ERP
description: Pune (Maharashtra) [India], May 28: In the ever-evolving landscape of the construction industry, the shift towards digital transformation is not just a trend‚Äîit‚Äôs a necessity. As a AECO software & services company at the forefront of innovation, we understand the pivotal role technology plays in not just enhancing operational efficiency but also in driving significant [...]
content: Pune (Maharashtra) [India], May 28: In the ever-evolving landscape of the construction industry, the shift towards digital transformation is not just a trend‚Äîit‚Äôs a necessity. As a AECO software & services company at the forefront of innovation, we understand the pivotal role technology plays in not just enhancing operational efficiency but also in driving significant cost savings. Among the myriad of technological advancements, cloud-based Construction ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) systems stand out as a game-changer for businesses in the construction sector. The Financial Edge of Cloud-Based Construction ERP: Reduced IT Infrastructure and Maintenance Costs Traditional ERP systems necessitate substantial upfront investment in IT infrastructure, including servers, storage, and an in-house IT team to manage and maintain this hardware. Cloud-based ERP solutions, on the other hand, eliminate these expenses. Hosted on the provider‚Äôs servers and accessed via the internet, they significantly reduce the need for physical hardware and the costs associated with its upkeep. This shift not only cuts down capital expenditure but also converts it into a predictable operational expense. Enhanced Scalability and Flexibility The construction industry is characterized by its dynamic nature, with the scale of operations constantly changing. Cloud-based ERP systems offer unparalleled scalability, allowing businesses to easily adjust their usage based on current needs without the need for physical hardware changes. This scalability ensures that companies pay only for what they use, optimizing expenses and improving financial flexibility. Improved Data Accuracy and Decision-Making Data is the lifeblood of decision-making in the construction industry. Cloud-based ERP systems provide real-time data access and analytics, empowering businesses with accurate information for timely decision-making. This immediacy not only improves project outcomes but also reduces costly delays and rework, directly impacting the bottom line. Streamlined Processes and Increased Productivity By integrating various business processes, from project management to finance and HR, cloud-based ERP systems create a cohesive workflow. This integration eliminates data silos, streamlines processes, and significantly enhances productivity. The efficiency gained translates into faster project completion times and reduced labor costs, contributing to overall financial health. Enhanced Security and Compliance Data security and regulatory compliance are critical concerns for the construction industry. Cloud-based ERP providers invest heavily in security measures, including data encryption and regular backups, ensuring that sensitive information is well-protected. Additionally, these systems are updated regularly to comply with the latest regulations, reducing the risk of costly legal penalties and protecting your company‚Äôs reputation. The adoption of cloud-based Construction ERP systems is more than just a step towards digital transformation; it‚Äôs a strategic move that promises significant financial benefits. From slashing IT-related expenses to enhancing operational efficiency, the financial advantages are compelling. As a construction software company, we are committed to empowering our clients with solutions that not only meet the demands of today but also pave the way for a more profitable and efficient future. title: ECOWAS at 49: President of the Commission‚Äôs Message
creator: Roger A. Agana
description: News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Roger A. Agana, https://newsghana.com.gh/ecowas-at-49-president-of-the-commissions-message/Message from His Excellency Dr. Omar Alieu Touray, President of the ECOWAS Commission Esteemed Ladies and Gentlemen, Citizens of ECOWAS Member States, Today marks the 49th anniversary of the signing of the treaty that gave birth to the Economic Community of West African States. Over nearly half a century, ECOWAS has stood as a beacon [...] News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Roger A. Agana, https://newsghana.com.gh/ecowas-at-49-president-of-the-commissions-message/
content: Message from His Excellency Dr. Omar Alieu Touray, President of the ECOWAS Commission Esteemed Ladies and Gentlemen, Citizens of ECOWAS Member States, Today marks the 49th anniversary of the signing of the treaty that gave birth to the Economic Community of West African States. Over nearly half a century, ECOWAS has stood as a beacon of regional cooperation, fostering shared prosperity and unity among our diverse peoples. As we commemorate this milestone, let us reflect on the remarkable achievements that ECOWAS has accomplished. From facilitating the free movement of people to promoting intra-regional trade, enhancing energy and transport infrastructure, advancing governance, and bolstering peace and security, ECOWAS has made tangible strides toward our collective vision of a peaceful and prosperous region. Yet, even as we celebrate our successes, we cannot ignore the challenges that persist. Insecurity remains a pressing concern, with some member states grappling with the daily threat of terrorism and the resulting displacement and food insecurity affecting large segments of our population. In the face of these challenges, our unity is paramount. It is our collective strength that will enable us to overcome adversity and safeguard the integrity of our community. As General Yakubu Gowon, one of ECOWAS‚Äô founding fathers, aptly remarked, the breakup of our community would be a grievous disservice to past, present, and future generations. Therefore, let us rally together under the theme of ‚ÄúStrengthening Regional Unity, Peace, and Security.‚Äù This theme underscores the urgent need to preserve the unity and peace envisioned by ECOWAS‚Äô founding fathers and reaffirms our commitment to working tirelessly toward these cherished objectives. I extend my heartfelt appreciation to our leaders, past and present, as well as to the dedicated members of our community and our valued partners, both local and international. It is through our collective efforts and unwavering unity that we will secure the peace and stability of our member states and pave the way for the harmonious socio-economic development of our region. In unity, there is strength. Let us remain steadfast in our resolve to uphold the ideals of ECOWAS and ensure a brighter future for generations to come. On this auspicious occasion, I wish our ECOWAS community and all its members a joyous anniversary. Long live ECOWAS! Long live African unity!

title: MP govt shuts down 66 'unsuitable' nursing colleges
creator: The Hans India
description: The Madhya Pradesh government has ordered the closure of 66 nursing colleges across the state, three months after the Madhya Pradesh High Court's order over 'irregularities' in affiliation.
content: Bhopal: The Madhya Pradesh government has ordered the closure of 66 nursing colleges across the state, three months after the Madhya Pradesh High Court's order over 'irregularities' in affiliation. The state's medical education department has issued a circular to district administration asking them to comply with the order. The action follows the directives of Chief Minister Mohan Yadav, to take strict action. The state government said that the Madhya Pradesh High Court has declared these colleges 'unsuitable', and subsequently, action for shutting them has been taken. The government, however, has also made it clear that students enrolled with these 66 colleges would not be affected. "Students of these colleges would not be affected. Their exams would be conducted," a statement from the medical education department, read. The development came even as the nursing college scam case is being heard in the high court. The case is about large-scale irregularities and corruption in nursing colleges. The CBI has been carrying out the investigation. The CBI had submitted its reports (charge sheet) on 308 nursing colleges, while the probe in another 300 nursing colleges was underway. Meanwhile, two officials of Madhya Pradesh Police -- inspectors Sushil Kumar Majoka and Rishikant Asathe, who were earlier attached to the CBI -- were arrested two weeks ago. Their arrest on an alleged bribery charge has raised multiple questions about the authenticity of the probe. The nursing college scam was exposed in 2021 and it reached the Madhya Pradesh High Court in 2023.

title: Oben Electric Accelerates Nationwide Expansion: Enters Capital City, Delhi along with Pune and Kerala
description: Bangalore (Karnataka) [India], May 28: Surging ahead with its nationwide expansion, Oben Electric, a homegrown performance electric motorcycle brand has announced its foray into key markets including the capital city ‚Äì Delhi, Pune and Kerala, while bolstering its presence in Bengaluru. Commitment to establishing a formidable presence across India, the company will target launching 50 new showrooms and service [...]
content: Bangalore (Karnataka) [India], May 28: Surging ahead with its nationwide expansion, Oben Electric, a homegrown performance electric motorcycle brand has announced its foray into key markets including the capital city ‚Äì Delhi, Pune and Kerala, while bolstering its presence in Bengaluru. Commitment to establishing a formidable presence across India, the company will target launching 50 new showrooms and service centers in 12 major Indian cities by the end of this year. Oben Electric strategically extends its footprint with showrooms in Delhi‚Äôs Pitampura and Pune‚Äôs Wakad area, marking its presence in these crucial markets. In Kerala, dealership showrooms have been unveiled in Kochi and Trivandrum, augmenting the brand‚Äôs penetration in the southern region. Furthermore, prime showroom locations have recently debuted in Bengaluru, including Banashankari, Rajajinagar, and Electronic City, in addition to the existing experience center in HSR Layout. With this expansion, Oben Electric now boasts a total of 8 showrooms across these key locations, consolidating its stronghold in strategic markets. Oben Electric‚Äôs rapid expansion is fueled by its flagship electric motorcycle, the Oben Rorr. Recognized as one of India‚Äôs safest electric motorbikes, the Rorr features an 8 kW IPMSM motor, accelerating from 0-40 kmph in 3 seconds with a top speed of 100 kmph. It sets a new benchmark in India‚Äôs electric two-wheeler market, offering a certified range of 187 km (IDC) and innovative LFP cell technology for extended battery life and enhanced heat resistance, ensuring a thrilling and reliable ride. Commenting on the expansion prospects, Ms. Madhumita Agrawal, Founder and CEO of Oben Electric, stated, ‚ÄúWe are thrilled to announce the launch of new showrooms across cities, marking a significant milestone in our expansion journey. With our strategic entry into the vibrant markets of Delhi, Pune, and Kerala, alongside our continued growth in Bengaluru, we are solidifying our position as an emerging leader in India‚Äôs electric vehicle industry. Our commitment to leading the EV revolution nationwide is evident as we focus on building a strong network of showrooms and service centers pan-India. We strive to deliver an unparalleled experience for eco-conscious consumers, showcasing our unwavering dedication to sustainability and innovation.‚Äù The new showrooms exemplify Oben Electric‚Äôs innovative design ethos, with dedicated areas for immersive customer experiences. Featuring interactive spaces, customers can explore the Oben Rorr up close, accompanied by a curated selection of accessories and merchandise for enthusiasts. These locations, also functioning as Oben Care service centers, provide end-to-end servicing, spare parts support, and an enriched customer journey. Utilizing cutting-edge technologies for detailed product information and engaging experiences, these showrooms underscore Oben Electric‚Äôs commitment to exceptional support and service across cities, strengthening its network and customer satisfaction. To learn more about Oben Electric and their innovative electric motorcycles, please visit their website at www.obenelectric.com . title: F1 dispute with Andretti Global draws in U.S. lawmakers
description: A dispute over whether to accept American motorsports giant Andretti Global as Formula One's 11th team is reaching boiling point. - www.cnbc.com
content: Former race car driver Mario Andretti listens during a news conference on May 01, 2024 in Washington, DC. Rep. John James (R-MI) hosted Andretti on Capitol Hill to respond to the Formula 1 management denying his family and General Motors the opportunity to join the global motorsports series. Anna Moneymaker | Getty Images Tensions reportedly spilled over at the Miami Grand Prix earlier this month as the CEO of F1's parent company, Liberty Media, told the F1 legend Mario Andretti that he "will do everything in his power to see that Michael [Mario's son and head of Andretti Global] never enters Formula One." Liberty Media declined to comment on the report by NBC News dated Thursday, which cited sources with knowledge of the incident, although an anonymous source close to Liberty Media said that the conversation occurred differently from how Andretti had described it. It's the latest twist in the Andretti saga, which started in October 2023 when the sport's governing body, the FIA, approved the American team's bid to join the grid. Three months later, F1, the sport's commercial arm, quashed the bid, arguing that Andretti wouldn't be competitive in 2025 or 2026. It argued that it would need to fight for race wins and podiums to bring any significant benefit to the sport. 'Not come for free' The average value of these sponsorship deals doubled after the introduction of a third U.S. Grand Prix in Las Vegas last year, according to... Chris Hawes

title: Golf champ Scottie Scheffler arrest video released, officer broke body camera rules
description: The case against Scottie Scheffler, the world's top golf player is proceeding in Louisville, Kentucky. He is accused of assaulting a police officer. - www.cnbc.com
content: Scottie Scheffler arrives to the course during the second round of the PGA Championship at Valhalla Golf Club in Louisville, Kentucky, on May 17, 2024. Ben Jared | PGA Tour | Getty Images A Louisville, Kentucky, police detective violated department policy by not activating his body camera during his controversial arrest of Scottie Scheffler last week when the top-ranked golfer was trying to drive into the PGA Championship venue, the city's police chief said Thursday. Detective Bryan Gillis "should have turned on his body-worn camera but did not," Louisville Metro Police Department Chief Jacquelyn Gwinn-Villaroel said at a press conference. "This officer has received corrective action for this policy violation" because of the seriousness of the violation, Gwinn-Villaroel said. Louisville Mayor Craig Greenberg at the press conference announced the release of video footage from the Friday morning incident showing the moments after Gillis arrested the 27-year-old Scheffler for allegedly assaulting him with his car as the golfer drove around other vehicles. The footage came from a pole camera and a police car dashboard camera. The video from the pole camera shows Gillis running after Scheffler's car as it slowly turns from behind several large vehicles, the detective slamming his hand or arm against the golfer's car, and Scheffler immediately stopping. Gillis and other cops then pulled him out and placed him into handcuffs about 50 seconds later. The video does not capture the seconds before that which Gillis reported included him being dragged by Scheffler's car. Greenberg said that "activating body-worn cameras is critically important to our police department." Louisville Police Chief Jacquelyn Gwinn-Villaroel, right, speaks to reporter as Louisville Mayor Craig Greenberg listens at left during a press... Dan Mangan

title: Fed‚Äôs Kashkari wants ‚Äòmany more months‚Äô of positive inflation data before rate cut
creator: Investing.com
content: The Federal Reserve should wait for more substantial progress on inflation before considering interest rate cuts, Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari told CNBC on Tuesday. When asked about the conditions for rate cuts in 2024, Kashkari said, ‚ÄúMany more months of positive inflation data, I think, to give me confidence that it‚Äôs appropriate to dial back.‚Äù The Fed official also didn't rule out further rate hikes if inflation persists, saying that the central bank shouldn‚Äôt rule anything out at this point. U.S. inflation increased by 0.3% in April, slightly less than expected, offering some relief to policymakers, but it remained 3.4% higher compared to the previous year. Kashkari remains confident that the Fed will eventually reach its 2% inflation target but stressed the importance of patience. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not seeing the need to hurry and do rate cuts, I think we should take our time and get it right,‚Äù he told CNBC. He also mentioned that while the central bank might consider adjusting its target rate in the future, it was premature to ‚Äúmove the goal posts‚Äù at this time. Earlier this month, Kashkari suggested that the Fed might need to keep interest rates steady for "an extended period"‚Äîpotentially all year‚Äîto achieve its inflation goal. Recently, there has been a growing divergence among major central banks on interest rate policies. The Fed, which has historically been quick to adjust rates, is becoming more cautious amid persistent inflation. In contrast, the European Central Bank is expected to lower rates ahead of the Fed, with key ECB officials supporting a June cut. Similarly, the Bank of England is anticipated to reduce rates this summer.

title: Molly-Mae Hague‚Äôs sister defends booking Ryanair for hen bash after online criticism
description: Molly-Mae Hague‚Äôs sister Zoe has said the reality star ‚Äúcan‚Äôt do right from wrong‚Äù after she was criticised for booking a Ryanair flight for her hen after treating her best friend to a private jet.
content: ‚ÄòI think it‚Äôs quite sad that she‚Äôs had to turn the comments off on that video‚Äô Molly-Mae and Zoe on their way to Ibiza Molly-Mae Hague‚Äôs sister Zoe has said the reality star ‚Äúcan‚Äôt do right from wrong‚Äù after she was criticised for booking a Ryanair flight for her hen after treating her best friend to a private jet. Molly-Mae had organised the ‚Äúbest weekend ever‚Äù for her sister Zoe as she whisked her and ten friends off to Ibiza to celebrate on the party island. But critics were quick to point out that the 24-year-old fianceÃÅ of Tommy Fury had used a private jet in March to take her best friend Tayla on a four-day ski trip in France to celebrate her birthday. It attracted comments such as, ‚Äúyour friend gets a private jet for her birthday but your sister doesn't for her hen's party? I'd be raging.‚Äù Another sniped: ‚ÄúMakes me giggle that her mate got a private jet but it's Ryanair for her sister.‚Äù Zoe defends her sister But now, Zoe has uploaded a new YouTube video where she declared: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt need to say anything, I‚Äôm sure you guys know me well enough now to know what I think about that.‚Äù Referring to Molly-Mae, she added: ‚ÄúPoor girl can‚Äôt do right from wrong, she really can‚Äôt. I think it‚Äôs quite sad that she‚Äôs had to turn the comments off on that video.‚Äù She ended by saying: ‚ÄúPeace and love over here, peace and love only, no hate, I love my sister and she loves me.‚Äù When she was then asked if she wanted a staycation or a hen do abroad she answered: ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs just go abroad, I feel like everyone needs some sun at this time of year as well, the only thing is when we looked at flights ages and ages ago, the flights were about ¬£520.‚Äù ‚ÄúObviously, ¬£520 for a return flight is a lot of money, however, Molly was so generous and very kind and said that no one has to pay for anything else, that‚Äôs literally all they‚Äôll have to pay for then potentially a little bit of spending money. ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt know all of this until we got there, but everyone was really generous and chipped in where they could. ‚ÄúMy friends that just paid for their flights also all sent me a bit of money to send to Molly as like a thank you and a little bit of a contribution towards the food and stuff.‚Äù ‚ÄúSo, all in all, it cost about ¬£700, which for some people for a hen do is quite a lot, I know it is quite a lot, but they were all saying ‚ÄòFor the experience we‚Äôre gonna get and for the villa that we‚Äôre staying in and the food we‚Äôre getting and drinks that we‚Äôre getting‚Äô, they were reasonably happy to do it.‚Äù ‚ÄúI did check with everyone before we booked anything to check this was going to be okay for everyone and it was.‚Äù ‚ÄúA lot of the questions were ‚ÄòHow did you split everything?‚Äô ‚ÄòHow did you pay bills at the end?‚Äô and we‚Äôre very fortunate that we didn‚Äôt have to and that Molly did get the majority of it,‚Äù she explained. Last week, a frustrated Molly-Mae Hague said she ‚Äúcan't win‚Äù after she was criticised for booking Ryanair. The sisters having fun on the hen Molly-Mae uploaded a video to her YouTube channel to address the backlash where she said she ‚Äúcan't win‚Äù no matter what she does. She even joked she will ‚Äúswim, bike and run‚Äù to her next location to keep her critics happy. ‚ÄúPeople talking about how they thought it was crazy that I booked my sister a Ryanair flight to take her on her hen do,‚Äù she says in the video. ‚ÄúThey're like 'I can't believe Molly booked a Ryanair flight for her and her sister's friends when a few weeks before she got her friend a jet. ‚ÄúThe amount of stick and the amount of intense comments I got from doing that treat for Tayla's birthday and getting the jet, made me think I probably won't ever do that ever again. ‚ÄúIt takes away that specialness of that experience because the reaction is just, so not worth it.‚Äù She added: ‚ÄúBecause if I fly commercial, well, it was actually making me feel like I was the worst sister in the entire world. Then, if I fly private, it is genuinely not worth it because it's all I hear about for that next few weeks. ‚ÄúWhat I'll do is I will do a triathlon. You will see me swimming, biking and running to my next location. She wrapped up by saying: ‚ÄúThere's so much going on in the world right now? A, why do people even care? and B, you can't win, you can't actually win. No matter what I do people are going to comment about it. In March, the star jetted 12 friends off on a private jet for a luxury getaway to mark her bestie Tayla Blue's 30th birthday in France. The former reality star surprised Tayla just a week before they flew out to the French Alps with an envelope saying the pair were going skiing. The influencer had organised for Tayla's husband, their baby, her sister and other friends to come along on the trip. Molly-Mae's fianceÃÅ Tommy Fury, their baby daughter Bambi, 14 months, and Molly's sister Zoe Hague also joined the celebrations. Tayla was seen walking onto the private jet with Hague before all their friends yelled surprise from inside the plane cabin.

title: Liam Cooper breaks silence on Leeds United's Wembley heartbreak against Southampton with 'come again' claim
creator: Tom Coates
description: Leeds United captain Liam Cooper has broken his silence on the club‚Äôs Wembley heartbreak.
content: Southampton emerged victorious from the Championship play-off final , sealing a return to the top flight at the expense of the Whites. Cooper, the longest serving player on Leeds‚Äô books, watched on from the bench as an unused substitute. Members of the Leeds squad opted against speaking post-match, but Cooper has now issued a brief statement via social media to address the defeat. Posting on X , formerly Twitter, he said: ‚ÄúProud of our club. We will come again.‚Äù Advertisement Advertisement Did you know with a Digital subscription to Yorkshire Post, you can get access to all of our premium content, as well as benefiting from fewer ads, loyalty rewards and much more. His words are accompanied by a picture of Leeds fans at Wembley , scarves aloft, in the final few minutes before kick-off under the arch. Another summer of change appears to be ahead for Leeds, who must now prepare for another season in the second tier. Cooper is out of contract and as it stands, will be seeking pastures new as a free agent. There will also inevitably be clubs circling for some of Leeds‚Äô most valuable assets. Crysencio Summerville, the 2023/24 Championship Player of the Season , is among those to have already been linked with a move away from Elland Road. Leeds boss Daniel Farke was reluctant to talk about changes to the squad in the immediate aftermath of the Wembley defeat, although a reshaping appears to be on the cards.

title: Exotic worlds part of new exoplanet catalogue, including extreme super-Earth, first sub-Saturn
creator: Aditya Madanapalle
description: Astronomers have characterised a number of extreme worlds in a new catalogue, including sub-Neptunes, sub-Saturns and super-Earths. Such discoveries are expected to get increasingly common as exoplanetary science moves from one of discovery to one of characterization. Multiple papers have been published based on the catalogue.
content: Astronomers have characterised a number of extreme worlds in a new catalogue, including sub-Neptunes, sub-Saturns and super-Earths. Such discoveries are expected to get increasingly common as exoplanetary science moves from one of discovery to one of characterization. Multiple papers have been published based on the catalogue. New Delhi: After three years of research, scientists have assembled the largest single catalogue so far characterising exoplanets. Such large catalogues are expected to get increasingly common in the future. The catalogue contains 120 confirmed exoplanets, and six exoplanet candidates that require follow-up observations to be confirmed. Contained in the catalogue are many weird and wonderful worlds, including a super-dense planet designated as TOI-1824 b . A paper describing the catalogue has been published in The Astrophysical Journal Supplement . Supplementary papers on individual systems include TOI-1347 b that possibly has an atmosphere, TOI-1386 a system with a transiting sub-Saturn as well as a non-transiting exoplanet with a mass comparable to Saturn, a sub-Neptune in orbit around TOI-1437 , a sub-Neptune with the designation of TOI-1751 b in orbit around a primordial, metal-poor star, and the super-dense sub-Neptune TOI-1824 b mentioned above. TOI-1386 The TOI-1386 system has a pair of known exoplanets orbiting a star that is similar to the Sun. The first of these is a sub-Saturn, a planet that straddles the size gap between Neptune and Saturn. TOI-1386 b is the first planet discovered in the size range, and scientists did not previously know that such worlds even existed. TOI-1386 b orbits the host star in 26 Earth days, while its companion, a planet of similar mass to Saturn takes 227 days to orbit the host star. One of the study authors, Michelle Hill says , ‚ÄúThere is ongoing debate about whether sub-Saturn planets are truly rare, or if we are just bad at finding planets like these. So, this planet, TOI-1386 b, is an important addition to this demographic of planets.‚Äù TOI-1437 b TOI-1437 b is also in orbit around a star similar to the Sun, with each year lasting 19 Earth days. This is a sub-Neptune, a world larger than Earth but smaller than Neptune. One of the study authors, Daria Pidhorodetska says , ‚ÄúPlanets smaller than Neptune but larger than Earth are the most prevalent worlds in our galaxy, yet they are absent from our own Solar System. Each time a new one is discovered, we are reminded of how diverse our Universe is, and that our existence in the cosmos may be more unique than we can understand.‚Äù What is interesting about this system is that the host star is of a similar mass, age and size as the Sun, allowing for an apples-to-apples comparison. This system enables an apt comparison between the Solar System and other star systems. The catalogue contains exotic exoplanets that are in even tighter orbits around their host stars. TOI-1798 c TOI-1798 c is in orbit around an orange dwarf star. The exoplanet is a sub-Neptune with an orbit of around 12 hours, or half a day. This is one of the few systems known with an inner planet that has an ultra-short period orbit. Lead author of the catalogue paper, Alex Polanski says , ‚ÄúWhile the majority of planets we know about today orbit their star faster than Mercury orbits the Sun, USPs take this to the extreme. TOI-1798 c orbits its star so quickly that one year on this planet lasts less than half a day on Earth.‚Äù The exoplanet is in such a close orbit around the host star that it receives 3000 times more radiation than the Earth receives from the Sun. The intense stellar radiation would have stripped away any atmosphere on the planet. The proximity of the host star also suggests that the exoplanet is tidally locked, with a day side always oriented towards the Sun, and a night side in perpetual darkness.

title: Billionaire to take sub to Titanic to prove industry's safer after OceanGate implosion
description: Larry Connor is preparing to plunge more than 12,400 feet to the site in a two-person Triton submersible, despite the tragedy that occurred during a similar attempt by OceanGate last year.
content: Larry Connor said he is preparing to plunge more than 12,400 feet to the site in a two-person Triton submersible (Image: The Connor Group / YouTube) A billionaire is planning to descend down to the wreck of the Titanic in a deep-sea submersible in a bid to prove the industry is safer following the catastrophic implosion of the OceanGate vessel last year. Ohio Real estate investor Larry Connor said he is preparing to plunge more than 12,400 feet to the site in a two-person Triton submersible, with the company's co-founder and CEO Patrick Lahey. Connor said he wants "to show people worldwide that while the ocean is extremely powerful, it can be wonderful and enjoyable and really kind of life-changing if you go about it the right way." He explained the ¬£15.7 million ($20 million) vessel Triton 4000/2 Abyssal Explorer they plan to use, which was designed by Lahey, is capable of carrying out multiple trips to the ocean's treacherous depths. function loadOvpScript(){let el=document.createElement('script');el.setAttribute('src','https://live.primis.tech/live/liveView.php?s=114945&playerApiId=v114945');document.getElementById('ovp-primis').appendChild(el)}window.top.addEventListener('primisPlayerInit',e=>{try{if(e.detail&&e.detail.playerApiId==="v114945"){if(window.document.getElementsByClassName('jwplayer')[0]){e.detail.float('disable')}}}catch(e){}});window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',()=>{setTimeout(()=>{if(typeof flagTcfLoaded!=='undefined'&&flagTcfLoaded===!0){loadOvpScript()ExpressApp.Log('[Load] OVP flagTcfLoaded',new Date())}else{document.addEventListener("tcfLoaded",()=>{loadOvpScript()ExpressApp.Log('[Load] OVP tcfLoaded',new Date())})}},1500)}) Connor told the Wall Street Journal : "Patrick has been thinking about and designing this for over a decade. But we didn‚Äôt have the materials and technology. You couldn‚Äôt have built this sub five years ago." READ MORE: Russia unveils terrifying new submarine missile capable of nuking the UK Connor will be accompanied by Triton Submarines co-founder Patrick Lahey (Image: The Connor Group / YouTube) The two men said their aim is to prove the feat can be achieved despite the last attempt by the Titan submersible in June ending in catastrophe, when the vessel imploded, killing all five people on board, including OceanGate chief executive Stockton Rush. The doomed sub had been heading to the same site when the tragedy occurred on June 18. But Connor called Lahey a few days later urging him to construct a better sub. Lahey told the outlet: "[He said], you know, what we need to do is build a sub that can dive to [Titanic-level depths] repeatedly and safely and demonstrate to the world that you guys can do that, and that Titan was a contraption." Connor hasn't yet revealed when their expedition will take place. DON'T MISS Putin's navy faces new enemy as Ukraine poised with elite stealth attack sub [REPORT] Titan victims knew 'exactly' what was happening before sub imploded, says expert [INSIGHT] Titanic sub widow shares 'anger' and suffering after son and husband's tragedy [LATEST] Lahey was critical of OceanGate's safety standards (Image: Ralph Krauss / YouTube) US court documents later showed that Mr Rush had ignored warnings that the submersible was not adequate for dives of that depth. Rush died when the vessel was crushed under the pressure alongside British-Pakistani businessman Shahzada Dawood, 48; his son Suleman, 19; British businessman Hamish Harding, 58; and Paul-Henry Nargeolet, 77, a former French navy diver. David Mearns, a rescue expert who knew two of the five men on board, told Sky News at the time: "The only saving grace is that it would have been immediate - literally in milliseconds. "The men wouldn't have known what was happening." SUBSCRIBE Invalid email We use your sign-up to provide content in ways you've consented to and to improve our understanding of you. This may include adverts from us and 3rd parties based on our understanding. You can unsubscribe at any time. title: 98,000 register to vote early
description: A total of 97,386 voters have registered to exercise their right to vote in advance on June 2, a source from the Ministry of Internal Administration (MAI) told Lusa agency.
content: According to MAI, early mobility voting, on Sunday, June 2nd, is allowed to all registered voters in the national territory, at a polling station of their choice and registration can be done until Thursday, the 30th. Portugal recorded, in the 2019 European elections, the worst abstention rate (68.6%) since belonging to the European Union, in contrast to participation in Europe - around 50%. To try to reverse this trend - in addition to the early voting of sick people, prisoners, and those abroad, or the mobility vote, on the previous Sunday (June 2nd) - this year there is a new modality, only possible because there are "dematerialised electoral registers". Any registered voter in Portugal can vote "other than in the place where they are registered", the spokesperson for the National Elections Commission ( CNE ), Fernando AnastaÃÅcio, explained to Lusa on the 25th. "You can choose without any pre-registration conditions, for example, you live in Lisbon, you are registered in Lisbon, but on the 9th you are in Porto, you can choose to go to any polling station in Porto: present yourself at the vote, identify yourself with your citizen card or a document that is considered valid for identification purposes and exercise your right to vote", he said. The elections were scheduled at the European level for the period from June 6th to 9th. And this is, according to the CNE spokesperson, "a particularly difficult period for Portugal", as it coincides with "a week that is usually a mini-holiday period. Around 373 million European voters are called to vote for the European Parliament between June 6th and 9th. In Portugal, voting is on the 9th. 720 MEPs will be chosen, 21 of which are Portuguese.

title: Lianlian DigiTech secures EMI license for European expansion
description: Lianlian DigiTech, a company specialising in digital payment solutions and global commerce digitalisation, announced it has been granted the Electronic Money Institution (EMI) License in Luxembourg.
content: This represents a significant step in Lianlian DigiTech's international expansion. The EMI License will allow Lianlian DigiTech to extend its services across Europe, enhancing its existing offerings in fund collection and VAT processing for e-commerce merchants. The company can now provide fund storage and withdrawal services, supporting its clients' growth in Europe. Additionally, this development enables the company to collaborate with other industry leaders to offer comprehensive cross-border financial services, including e-wallets and currency exchange solutions. Commitment to globalisation Lianlian DigiTech adheres to a ‚Äòcompliance-first, license-first‚Äô approach, emphasizing globalization in its growth strategy. The company has invested in localization efforts by establishing local offices, forming resolute local teams, obtaining local licenses, and partnering with local institutions. These measures aim to strengthen its global service capabilities and secure its position in the international market. Founded in 2009, Lianlian DigiTech provides a range of digital payment and value-added services to customers globally. As of 31 December 2023, the company holds 64 payment licenses and qualifications, serves more than 100 countries and regions, and supports transactions in over 130 currencies.

title: Lai Calls On Troops To Make Taiwan 'Safer' After China Drills
description: Three days after Lai was sworn into office, warships and fighter jets encircled Taiwan in drills China said were a test of its ability to seize the island it claims as part of its territory.
content: INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS TIMES NEWSLETTER SIGNUP My account Log Out May 28, 5:02 AM EDT World U.S. Economy & Markets Companies Technology Digital Life Culture Sports Crypto Opinion NEWSLETTER My account Log Out US Edition World U.S. Economy & Markets Companies Technology Digital Life Culture Sports Crypto Opinion Listings & More Spotlight Glossary SMB Forum Glossary K-Wave CEO Spotlight Editions Australia Edition India Edition International Edition Singapore Edition United Kingdom United States NEWSLETTER Follow Us Editions Australia Edition India Edition International Edition Singapore Edition United Kingdom United States World Lai Calls On Troops To Make Taiwan 'Safer' After China Drills By AFP News Published 05/28/24 AT 5:01 AM EDT Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on LinkedIn Share on Reddit Share on Flipboard Share on Pocket Taiwan's President Lai Ching-te thanked troops in Hualien for their hard work to respond to China's military drills AFP Taiwan's President Lai Ching-te thanked troops on Tuesday after China held military exercises around the self-ruled island, as he urged them to help make it "safer". Three days after Lai was sworn into office, warships and fighter jets encircled Taiwan in drills China said were a test of its ability to seize the island it claims as part of its territory. Lai vowed in his inaugural speech to defend Taiwan's democracy and freedom, which Beijing said amounted to a "confession of independence". Speaking during a visit to an air force base in eastern Hualien on Tuesday, Lai toasted the troops for their hard work "in response to China's military exercises" -- his first direct reference to the war games on Thursday and Friday. "Let's work together and continue to work hard to make our country safer," he said. "Everyone is on standby 24 hours a day to perform air patrol missions... All brothers and sisters use their firm determination and outstanding combat skills to demonstrate their air combat capabilities and protect our airspace," he added. Lai also visited an army base where he watched artillerymen demonstrate loading and discharging a howitzer. He gave the soldiers a "red envelope" -- a tradition during holidays -- as a token of appreciation and took group photos with the troops. The Hualien air force base saw dozens of fighter jets take off on Friday, the second day of China's military drills. China has upped military and political pressures on Taiwan in recent years, and its naval vessels, drones and warplanes maintain a near-daily presence around the island. On Tuesday, Taiwan's defence ministry said three Chinese warplanes, and 11 naval and coastguard ships were detected in the past 24 hours -- down from the 21 aircraft and 15 ships it reported on Monday. Experts say these are "grey zone tactics", which stop short of outright acts of war but serve to exhaust Taipei's military. A Taiwanese Air Force F-16 fighter jet approaches for landing at an air force base in Hualien in eastern Taiwan on May 24, 2024 AFP ¬© Copyright AFP 2024. All rights reserved.
